OUR MISSION
We all just have this one live- why take the risk and cycle without light?
Without lighting, cyclists risk their lives in the dark - but those on the road with battery lights will soon be left in the dark when the journey takes too long or the batteries are no longer full. For those who do not want to mount heavy dynamos, use batteries or lay cables, we've launched two Kickstarter projects with our non-contact Magnic Lights, which feel like battery lighting without having to exchange or change batteries. Magnic Microlights can't be turned off at daylight and we are convinced this makes sense from a safety point of view: With lights on your visibilty increases significantly which means a great deal of safety.

12. ILLEGAL COPIES & PLAGIARISM
On the web you can find several illegal copies of our patented technology. 
Patent infringing Magnic Light plagiarism

The sellers don't care for patents and they also fool the customers because their produtcs don't work as promised (and will fail completely after ~30 hours usage because the internal batteries will be empty).

Unterstützer aus Deutschland können auch per Lastschrift bezahlen. Finanzierungsbeiträge werden erst bei erfolgreicher Finanzierung nach Ablauf einer Zwei-Wochen Frist abgebucht.
Besteht ein Risiko, wenn das Projektziel nicht erreicht wird?: Nein- Nach Projektende wird der Betrag nur dann eingezogen, wenn das Projektziel erreicht wurde.
14. FAQ
Do Magnic Microlights fit to my bike?
Yes- if you have "Standard" rim brakes (Caliper, Vbrake, Cantilver brakes). Even for disc brake systems we have a clamp adapter solution- but this is just for light and does not provide brake light.
Do Magnic Microlights work with Carbon rims?
No- we need a metal rim. Aluminum is best. Magnesium works, too. 
I want to add mutiple rewards to my pledge. Is this possible?
Yes- This is ok for all available rewards except limited rewards (otherwise the limitation fails)  and complete bicycles (high shipping cost). Just add the amount for additional rewards to your pledge (without additional shipping cost). After project termination you will receive a survey where you can specify your desired combination. 
Do I have to exchange brake pads often?
No- "Normal" cyclists exchange their bicycles more frequently than the brake pads because these usually last for more than 5000 kilometers. Hardcore bikers have to exchange the brake pads from time to time.

updates.update_content:
Dear Microlight & Wega Backers,
In the last few weeks we were finally able to complete important milestones:
The revisions of the plastic molds were successful (they were necessary because of small deformations) and the stability was significantly improved by the addition of fiberglass.
 The first 20 Wega lamps were made from the final sample material and 2 complete sets were shipped. One Wega set will soon be on a tour through Scandinavia while the other Wega set (two front and two rear lights) is already on tour at the Race Around Germany for more than a week and is subjected to an extreme endurance test (more about this race below).

Liebe Kickstarter Backer,
Gestern bekamen wir die Information, dass die Änderungen an den problematischen Gehäuseteilen nun behoben werden konnten. (Siehe das letzte Update: Die Generatorgehäuse hatten leichte Dellen, die beim Abkühlen des Spritzgussprozesses auftraten.)

Dear Backers,
Yesterday we got the info that the changes in the problematic housing parts have now been fixed. (See the last update: The generator housings had slight dents which occured in the cool down of the injection molding process).

Dear Kickstarter Backers,
After yesterday's update, here I have a short supplementary video of the Wega front light.

Dear Kickstarter Backers,
The last weeks the project made big progress so that we are close to delivery of your lights now. We might even send out a few first Wega lights in February but some small adjustments will improve usability and stability so that we decided to wait the revision and start shipments in March.
For the Microlights the aluminum housings will be finished in March so that we have to start with the Wega version and the Microlights will follow a few weeks later.

Mit allen Formen wird aktuell eine kleine Vorab-Serie von Spritzgussteilen erstellt, die wir hier im Laufe der nächsten Woche erwarten. Nach unserer Freigabe, kann dann die Massenfertigung im Januar starten.

Dear Backers,
I was asked for the progress this week and on Thursday I received this production video of the molds for final Wega parts.

Dear Backers,
This week I was asked by some backers for an update from production. This morning our supplier sent us new images and a short video from mold production for the Wega version. They are finishing all molds these days and we hope that this will be possible without bigger problems.

campaign.story:
Why choose Chicso？ Keys are easy to lose. Passwords are easy to forget. Bluetooth locks are easy to hack.  Chicso is the ultimate security solution to make luggage, outdoor, and gym theft a thing of the past. 
The Chicso features an Advanced Fingerprint Sensor with a 0.2 sec unlock time along with an unbreakable design. Chicso provides fast and secure unlocking experience. With IP65 rated waterproof, 360° fingerprint recognition, ultra-long standby time and storage for 40 fingerprints, you need only one finger to keep your belongings safe.
Problems Solved：
No more worry about forgetting your password. 
No need to carry keys or a mobile phone with you. 
No need for multiple steps just to open the lock. 
One touch is all you need to open your secure lock. 
Say goodbye to your old bulky lock and step into the future. Chicso is so small that you can easily keep it in your pocket until you’re ready to keep your stuff protected. Chicso is superior to the simple match-and-unlock mechanism on ordinary locks, as access is only allowed through your unique fingerprint. Great for indoor or outdoor use, and CHICSO is widely used for luggage, golf bags, handbags, school lockers, gym lockers, furniture, wardrobes, bike and anything else that you need secured. 
USD$30,000 UNLOCKED: NEW COLOR - SILVER!
(Color option survey will be distributed via Kickstarter after the campaign ends.)
  Your fingerprint is your key, Chicso is much safer and more convenient, as it’s truly keyless. A smart lock that loyally defends and protects your valuables on all of your journeys. 
Chicso features a 3ft (1m) long retractable wire made from cut-resistant 304 stainless steel, which has a load-bearing capacity of 120kg. The shackle is flexible and incredibly strong which makes it the ideal lock for any situation. As an accessory, widely used for luggage, furniture, wardrobes, bike and anything else.
Chicso, unlike many other intelligent locks on the market, can prevent copycat fingerprints from thieves. This A.I. fingerprint identification solution reads prints in high resolution (508 dpi) and from 360 degrees. 
Chicso knows the difference between a live fingerprint and a picture of a fingerprint and will reject anything that isn’t 100% authentic. Chicso relies on independent A.I. technology to keep user biometric data safe and secure.  
Chicso allows for two administrator fingerprints which enables multi-user management. Up to 40 fingerprints can be registered on the lock so you can share it with friends and family.  
With 100% construction made of aviation grade aluminum alloy, Chicso is ready to handle daily bumps and bruises and can stand up to any tampering by force. 
Chicso’s design is super resistant to prying, slamming, cutting, or anything else that could break weaker locks. Chicso uses an integrated stamping method to create an aluminum alloy, making it ultra-strong and capable of standing up to potential breaking attempts. 
Multispectral recognition systems can read your fingerprint even if it’s wet, oily, dry, or dirty. 
With IP65 dust and water resistance, Chicso can stand up to the elements, meaning that it is excellent for both indoor and outdoor use. 
 Chicso is also resistant to varying temperatures from -20°C-45°C（-4°F-113°F）. Take your Chicso wherever you go without worrying about environmental factors.  
Smart locks need to be reliable, meaning that the battery should work for long periods. Chicso uses a 130mAh built-in battery, and the system is incredibly energy efficient, using only (0.5μm), allowing for one year of regular use (with more than 3,500 unlock/lock actions) or one year of standby on a single charge. Even if the battery dies, Chicso features quick charging technology to get powered up sooner rather than later. 
TEST VEDIO
PLAY

About Us 
Whenever we used to go out for exercise, fitness, swimming, etc., we would have to bring our traditional keys—this caused a lot of inconvenience. But now, life is much more convenient with a fingerprint sensing lock. It protects our personal belongings and privacy, and with the keys being at our fingertips, opening a lock has never been more convenient. Our designer team did an excellent job on this project.

campaign.story:
The first DIY custom molded truly wireless earphones that easily form to the exact shape of your ears. Simply heat the Decibullz thermo-fit earpieces in water and press them into your ears for a perfect fitting earphone that will never fall out or become uncomfortable. Let's face it, earphones are worthless if they don’t stay in your ears. Decibullz earphones stay in your ears no matter what!
                             Easily create perfect fitting custom molded earphones in minutes with our all-new Decibullz Press-Fit System. Simply heat the earpieces in hot water, snap in the earphones and press them into your ear. The earpieces will hold their shape until they are re-heated. The earpieces can be re-molded to make sure you get a perfect fit.
The Black Diamond earphones are the most secure true wireless earphones ever made. We want people to do whatever they choose without having to worry about their earphones falling out or becoming uncomfortable.
Decibullz has a track record of creating some of the best sounding earphones available. Our earphones have been recognized by some of the industry's toughest critics earning two CES Innovation Awards as well as Reviewed.com's Best Earphone of 2015. We are known for our well-balanced sound signature that is clean, powerful, and distortion free.
The Black Diamond earphones feature a digital audio passthrough allowing you to hear external sounds when you want it and shut it out when you don't. Decibullz makes some of the best hearing protection so it's no surprise that our earphones do an amazing job of blocking out external noise.
BLUETOOTH 5.0
The Black Diamond earphones use the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology designed specifically for true wireless audio and data. The means a stronger connection, 2X range, better audio quality, and 2X faster data transfer speeds.
LDS ANTENNA
We have integrated all new LDS antenna technology into the Black Diamond earphones. This new antenna is designed to provide an extremely strong connection while increasing the wireless rage.
The Black Diamond earphones are one of the longest lasting true wireless earphones available. 25 hours of total play time and 5+ hours of continuous music playback. 
Simply remove the earphones from the charging case and pair to your phone. Seriously, that's it! The earphones will then automatically sync to your phone everytime they are removed from the charging case.
It's all about freedom. No more reaching to your device to adjust volume, control your music, make calls, or use voice assistants like Alexa, Siri, or Google. 
We include everything you need to make the best fitting true wireless earphones with ease.
What's In The Box
Decibullz Black Diamond Earphones 
Thermo-fit Custom Earpieces
Press-fit Molding Tool
Custom Silicone Canal Tips S, M, L
USB C Charging Cable
Instructions
Once again we want to thank everyone for their overwhelming support! To show you how much we value our backers we have decided to add an extra set of molds to every Kickstarter earphone for FREE if we reach $200,000!
The absolute best way to keep earphones secure and comfortable is to fit them to the exact shape of your ears. Ears are too diverse for the traditional one-size-fits-all approach.
OUR STORY
Decibullz started out as a weekend project to make an affordable set of custom molded earphones that would not fall out while being active. Decibullz has quickly become the leader in affordable custom earpieces making the best custom-fit earphones, earplugs, and acoustic filters on the market. Put simply, if it goes in your ear we make it better. 
Decibullz is located in Fort Collins Colorado. Our team is dedicated to the pursuit of bringing custom molded earpieces to the masses. 
TRUE WIRELESS DEVELOPMENT
We have been working on a custom molded true wireless earphone for years and Black Diamond has turned into a true passion project for the Decibullz team. We were tired of seeing me-too companies make the same true wireless products without adding any real value. We know that combining our custom molded earpieces with the latest Bluetooth technology would create truly amazing earphones. 
 We have created and tested hundreds of prototypes in our pursuit to create the perfect earphones. 
We scrutinized every aspect of the design, refusing to compromise or rest until everything was perfect.

campaign.story:
HELLO Kickstarters,
After smashing our Kickstarter goal in 2016 with our first HELLO device and getting over 1300% funded, we come back to Kickstarter to present to you 4 new HELLO products to change the way we communicate forever. 
Who are we?  
Who are we? We are Solaborate - an end-to-end encrypted communication and collaboration company. We believe that simplifying communication tools and service represents our greatest opportunity to improve people's lives. 
With the unbelievable support of a community of 900+ people from 60 countries all over the worlds, and shipping 100% of HELLO Communication devices to all our backers last year, we're incredibly excited to present to you HELLO 2 and four new HELLO products:   
Introducing: 
1. HELLO 2  
2. HELLO Touch TV + Whiteboarding  
3. HELLO Creator Edition
4. HELLO Controller
HELLO 2 - The World's Most Powerful Communication Device 
HELLO 2 is designed together with our community to address some of the most annoying video and audio communication issues we face today.
With significantly improved hardware and software, the second generation HELLO 2 transforms any TV into the world’s most powerful communication device for video conferencing, digital whiteboarding, wireless screen sharing, Alexa and Google Voice Assistant, TV streaming, gaming, live broadcasting, camera feed with motion and voice detection + infrared night vision, and more.
The HELLO Solaborate Messenger platform has been in the making for more than 6 years. With tight integration across our devices and mobile/PC platforms, we aim to make collaboration seamless. HELLO Messenger can be easily accessed via your Android, iOS, Web and Desktop Clients. 
HELLO 2 will also support the best video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Meet, Zoom, Cisco WebEx, Facebook Messenger, WeChat, BlueJeans, Polycom RealPresence, Fuze, Unify, and more.
HELLO Touch - Real time Video Conferencing & Whiteboarding
 Powered by HELLO 2, the 65-inch HELLO Touch is the smartest and most affordable 4K Touch TV with 10 multi-touch points for real-time collaboration, digital whiteboarding, video conferencing, wireless sharing, and more.  

The primary function of HELLO Touch is to serve as a digital whiteboard with tight video and audio ingratiation so that your virtual teams in other physical locations can collaborate in real-time from any device without limitations.


The possibilities of HELLO Touch and Whiteboarding are virtually endless. 
HELLO Creator Edition
HELLO Creator Edition comes in a transparent casing, letting you see the inner workings of the device, which reflects our open source ideology in a physical aspect. If you didn’t get the hint already, we are now opening our platform for developers to build any hardware gadget extensions or software applications on top of our open platform.
This version of HELLO is designed and built specifically with the developer community in mind and we cannot wait to see what developers from all over the world will build on top of our platform.
HELLO Gadget Extensions
HELLO Gadget Extensions are a collection of connected products that enhance communication and interactions with HELLO devices. We built HELLO Button and Controller as an example to show you how easy it is to extend the HELLO capabilities, and we can’t wait to see what kind of gadgets you will create next.


HELLO Controller
The HELLO Controller  is a new way to play games through your HELLO device from the comfort of your couch anytime you need a break from work, or simply want to enjoy your time with family and friends.

Since you can now install any Android game of your choice on HELLO 2, our slick, super-responsive controller will allow you to play any game. A software version of the HELLO Controller which will make it easier to play games from your mobile phone will also be available on our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app.

The Making of HELLO 2 
Having learned a lot from the HELLO 1 experience and your feedback, making HELLO 2 in a sense was much easier. However we’ve spent much more work on ensuring that our passion for beautiful hardware and software is translated into a reliable and manufacturable device.
Hardware and software quality testing, reliability testing and manufacturing setup have been our go to words all along this project and we feel proud and ready to share our work and love with you.
HELLO 2 Features

Secure, sleek and feature-packed, HELLO 2 brings a whole range of new possibilities to life and is the ultimate all-in-one communication device for your home and office.  

It comes with built-in speakers, infrared night vision, Zigbee for home automation, NFC, hardware-based privacy buttons and 152-degree FOV coverage with automatic tilting. 

Video & Audio Calls
Crystal Clear Audio and Video Calls  
From sharing family moments to business meetings, HELLO 2 aims to make your life easier via communications. Need to make unlimited one on one or group audio and video calls for free whenever you need to stay in touch with your family and friends? With HELLO, they’re just a call away!

Tired of having to spend the first 10-15 minutes of every online meeting trying to properly establish the call or making sure you hear each-other? HELLO completely eliminates this problem by offering you crystal clear unlimited audio and video conference calls for free, anytime you need to have an online meeting with your remote teams, clients, or even potential customers.  

HELLO 2 is equipped with powerful hardware, with a 4K HDR sensor, an array of 4 beamforming microphones for noise cancellation, makes sure to pick up sounds and your expressions from a distance 8m+, even in the most challenging environments. To start an instant video or audio call, use our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or any other app of your choice.


Use Your Favorite Voice Assistant
  We love our phones, but sometimes, after a long busy day, they are a drag. That is why we integrated the magic of Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant into the HELLO 2 - to always answer your questions and commands.  

Listen to your favorite playlists, make audio and video calls, send and receive messages, get weather and forecast information, find out sports scores, order food, and more — in real time!
Alexa Voice Assistant
Interact with your favorite voice assistant productively and let it integrate with your routine to help you get things done! Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant are able to learn from your behavior and be there for you whenever you need them to.
Google Assistant
Seamless Home Automation
HELLO 2 has full integration and support with Alexa and Google Assistant for full home automation compatibility.

Create your personal area network for home automation with Zigbee which can be easily installed in your home with no need for additional cables.
Wireless Screencasting
With HELLO 2 it's super easy to share and cast any content in real time from your phone or laptop while you are near the TV or away from it. Share an experience, a presentation, a picture or a funny video with everyone in the room.

  Wireless Screen Sharing
  In a hectic world like ours, it is always smart to be as much productive and efficient as you can. Want to share something interesting with your team or simply make a presentation without any wires.

Gaming & TV Streaming
Switch to your favorite TV Mode - be it Gaming or TV Streaming, whenever you feel like playing video games or watching movies with your family and friends.

HELLO Gaming
We all know the best bonding memories with your family and friends happen when you play games and have fun in each other’s company. HELLO brings that fun back to the big screen in your living room or office. Just switch to Gaming Mode and play any Android game you want, even when you are at work and need a refreshing short break.

HELLO TV Streaming
 The TV Streaming mode will allow you to only see streaming apps on your Home Screen. Watch TV through any Android app you have installed on your HELLO to follow your favorite series or movies using Netflix, Youtube, HBO NOW, KODI or other TV streaming providers.  

No need for extra cables or boxes. All you have to do is find time to catch up with the latest episodes, sit back, and enjoy.

  Collaboration Mode 
Collaboration Mode allows you to link your Google or Office 365 Calendars and start meetings directly from your HELLO, with just one click. Whether the meeting was scheduled in Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom or other communication apps, HELLO will open them and your meeting will be ready to start. 

HELLO Rooms Controller
Never second guess a room’s schedule. HELLO Rooms Controller app is designed to start a meeting with one click. It supports both HELLO video app and third-party video apps. Its has built in integration with Google and Office 365 calendar so that scheduling and meeting is super simple. It also has SIP Phone dial-in and out including interoperability between SIP clients. You do not own a Touch TV ? No Problem, HELLO Rooms Controller will allow you to cast your touch input to any TV. 


Camera Feed With Motion Detection and Night Vision 
Easily check on your home, kids, or pets – when out and away. And if any unusual activities may occur — when uninvited friends come by or even Santa dropping by — motion-activated notifications will pop on your phone, offering you an excellent and secure connection with your home, when needed.

The Camera Feed of HELLO 2 is packed with motion detection as well as infrared night vision features which offer you full power and let you know whenever something moves in front of your HELLO at home or even office so you will be alerted at all times and take the necessary measures, even when it’s dark.
Install any Android Apps 
HELLO 2 comes with numerous pre-installed apps such as Skype, Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Facebook Messenger, WeChat, Amazon Chime, Google Hangouts Meet, GoToMeeting, BlueJeans, WebEx and more.  

HELLO 2 Integration with Microsoft Teams 

Besides pre-installed apps, you’ll be able to install any apps of YOUR choice. Grab the freedom to personalize your HELLO and bring all your favorite apps in one place.

  Easy Setup and Control

HELLO 2 is lightweight, compact, and easy to set up. Simply unbox it, plug in the power adapter and connect the HELLO device to any TV via an HDMI cable. Download the HELLO Solaborate Messenger app to scan your unique QR code and you’re good to go within two minutes!
To assure you have the best possible experience, you have the option to control the device through its hardware air mouse remote control that comes with it inside the box, or through the remote app for both Android and iOS. Just pick your favorite!
Automatic Tilting
To ensure full-view for professional-quality video HELLO 2 offers automatic tilting. Adjust the tilting remotely through our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or by simply touching the ring around the HELLO 2 camera.

Automatic Tilting - View from the HELLO 2 
                                       Crafted from 6000 Series Aluminium & High-Quality plastics/silicone, HELLO 2 offers reliable durability combined with elegance to best fit any home or office.
With HELLO Creator Edition we're showing the inner workings of HELLO 2, both physical and software so we can feed our engineering spirit and build what we love together. Transparent. Open. Beautiful.
Built-in Hack-Proof Video and Audio Controls for Ultimate Privacy
  We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right and that’s why we engineered HELLO 2 with two built-in hack-proof privacy controls and end-to-end encryption for everyone’s protection and peace of mind. Unless hackers come to your office or home in person, there is no way for them to access the audio and video of your HELLO 2 when you’ve deactivated them with the privacy buttons. When you activate them, the microphone and camera lines are physically cut from the system (going into the SoC). Therefore software cannot control them.


Near Field Communication (NFC)
NFC will allow you to easily jump into a whiteboarding session or video conferencing room, and share content or files of your choice through the HELLO 2 by simply bringing your phone close to the device.  

When you join any office meeting room that uses HELLO 2, you can be set up and ready to go with a personalized experience in a matter of seconds!

Dual Screen Support 
The new dual-screen feature allows you to connect HELLO 2 with two TVs at the same time so that you can use two different features on two separate TVs. If you need to use Whiteboarding and Video calling, Screen Sharing and Video Calling, and so on at the same time, you can use the dual-screen support to fully use whiteboarding on one TV, and fully see the video call feed on the other.

Product Timeline
Stay Tuned with US
Thank you so much for your continuous support! To keep up with the latest updates on HELLO, follow us on our social media channels:
Meet HELLO Team
 The hard work and dedication of our HELLO Team has been truly unbelievable these past few years and creating the next-generation of HELLO and 4 other innovative HELLO products, has been our greatest achievement!    

These top-of-the-line HELLO products have not only helped us increase productivity internally white building HELLO products and apps, but have helped an immense amount of people and teams all over the world increase their efficiency and improve their work-life balance as well.  

But we couldn’t be here without you so we cannot thank you enough for all your help and constant support!

Pick up your favorite Reward
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks are very low as we’ve done this before and learned so much with you in our first and very successful Kickstarter campaign for HELLO I. We delivered 100% of HELLO devices and have offered and continue to offer 24/7 support to all our backers. Having learned from our prior experience we started work on HELLO 2 early on and made sure we passed all the development stages and we are ready for mass production.
This time we are counting on a bigger team which has grown from 47 people to over 80 during the past year.

We’ve been working very hard to address all your feedback and innovate on top of it. We’ve poured all our effort to bring this device to life, and we’re confident that all our backers will love our HELLO products as much as we do. 

As with any product designed for mass production, manufacturing HELLO 2, HELLO Touch TV, HELLO Creator Edition, HELLO Button, and HELLO Controller requires injection molding, equipment setup, and certifications that will demand additional costs and development time. Your pledges will help getting around some of these costs. As a ticket of appreciation and early-on help, when it’s most needed, we’ll ensure that you as a HELLO backer, not only will receive the product(s) you pledge in a timely manner, but also have access to lifetime use of all the features we offer.
Our development team has already started working on delivering all new HELLO products, and unless confronted with an issue beyond human control, we will deliver the products to you with the highest possible quality.

campaign.story:
Missed the Kickstarter campaign but still want to get your hands on a Think Board X?
A peel and stick whiteboard, powered by the futuristic Rocketbook app. Unleash your creativity with the utility of the cloud.
The Think Board X functions like a traditional whiteboard, but connects to the power of digital with the Rocketbook mobile app. That means before you erase your notes, they can be scanned to online destinations like Google Drive, Dropbox, and Evernote — perfectly organized. Now, your ideas can live forever, even after they are erased!
Organize your quick notes and tasks 
Share brainstorms and updates with your team 
Capture your next million dollar idea
                                                  The Think Board X works with Rocketbook's cloud organization system. Using the Rocketbook app, you assign 7 shortcut “symbols” to a destination of your choice. 
Save: Store files and documents to any folder in Dropbox, Google Drive, OneNote, OneDrive, Box, or Evernote. 
Execute: Send files straight to Trello, Slack, or email.
After you have completed scanning, simply select the destination symbol(s) you would like to send your notes. The Rocketbook app instantly files your notes in the right place. Your notes, ideas and to-do lists will be more organized than ever before!
             *After the campaign ends you will receive a Backerkit survey where you will have an opportunity to make additions to your order and confirm your shipping address.
           The Think Board X naturally works best on walls and desks, but also works great on other fun surfaces such as: windows, refrigerators, tables, laptops, binders, notebooks, mirrors, chalkboards, whiteboards, old whiteboards, or whiteboard paint.
            Unlike traditional whiteboards, the Think Board X erases clean every time because it is built with a proprietary polyester composite that is made to last. Our favorite markers are Expo Low Odor, but feel free to use any other dry erase markers found online or in-stores.
            Whether you put your Think Board X on painted drywall, a wooden desk, or a stainless steel refrigerator, our micro-bead adhesive is specifically designed to not damage your surface or leave any residue behind.
            The magic of the Rocketbook System starts after you write on your Think Board X. Fire up the app and use the patent-pending image scan-and-enhance technology to accurately and quickly capture all of your notes and brainstorms. Then, beam them all to you favorite cloud services! 
            With optical character recognition (OCR) you can name your scans by adding double hashtags on each side of your title on the Think Board X. Then scan the page to transcribe the text between the double hashtags. (ex: ## Team Meeting ## will automatically label your scan to "Team Meeting")
           Whether analyzing trends in your personal habits, tracking company goals, or creating alternative methods for student assessments, the Think Board X will allow you to review incremental change and stay on track!
            In an instant, the Rocketbook app crops and enhances each page so your digital notes are more crisp and vibrant than the real thing.
           Step 1: Find smooth surface and wipe it clean of any dust 
(For super smooth surfaces like glass, mist the surface with water prior to installing to ensure a bubble-free install)
Step 2: Peel Think Board X off of the liner with the help of a friend
Step 3: Stick to surface and smooth into place with a microfiber cloth (included)
           "It all started in my Babson College dorm room. I needed a space to write down business ideas and stay organized from week to week. However, I couldn't drill holes into the wall to set up a massive whiteboard or paint my walls with whiteboard paint. That's when Think Board was born - a dry erase film that was easy to install and remove, looked beautiful, and worked like a charm. I stuck the first version of our product to my dorm room wall to write down OTHER business ideas. After about 50 or more bad ideas, enough friends had come into my room saying "Hanson, your other ideas aren't that great... but THIS thing... this is cool. Where can I get one?
.... we launched our first Kickstarter in 2014 and Think Board was born!" - Hanson Grant
    Once shipped, you should receive a tracking number (please allow at least 24 hours for the tracking number to update). We plan to ship via USPS, DHL or UPS. For international customers, your order will be handled by USPS or DHL up to the entry of your country. Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International shipments will take 14-21 days. US orders will arrive within 5 business days.
If the package is returned because you're not at the location, entered in the wrong address, or moved locations without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. Please keep an eye on the tracking number when it arrives in your email inbox.
We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this. Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter. Check out this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency: http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculation As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and is converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs. Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars: http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html

campaign.story:
On a hot summer's day, what is more fun than a water fight? But let’s be honest – there are no good water guns around anymore. Squirting pathetic water streams after minutes of pumping? That's not what water guns should be like in 2018.  
We think that the water gun has the potential to become so much more. This is why two years ago, we set out on a mission: to completely reinvent the water gun – and take water fights to the next level.  
The water gun revolution is already on the way
 You would like to write or post about Spyra One too? Find our press and media kit here!
Simply pull the trigger and feel the powerful shots. Each water bullet is exactly 30 ml – about the size of a shot glass. There's no need for paint or target vests to find out who hit whom: the water bullets leave clear water marks on your friends' shirts. Let them fade after a few minutes in the sun and get ready for a rematch! 
Combining range with precision for the first time. If you're older than five, water fighting is as much about pure range as driving is about just getting there. So Spyra One not only matches the range of the top water guns on the market. Its patent-pending valve-nozzle technology also achieves a previously unknown precision: Instead of soaking, Spyra One's water bullets clearly hit their targets at up to 7.5 meters – that's as far as the laws of physics allow! 
No protection needed – it's just water. Because of our specifically engineered valve-nozzle technology, Spyra One requires only low pressure levels to achieve maximum precision and range. You don't need any protective gear to start a fight wherever there's water around.  
Refilling becomes part of the game. With the push of a button, Spyra One refills the entire tank with water – 25 shots in 14 seconds. Gone are the times where the break to run into the house and refill your tank was the killer of every water battle. With Spyra One, counting your water bullets and refilling strategically becomes part of the fight. 
Refill anywhere, from any water source. Spyra One's pumping system is protected by a water filter, so you don't have to worry about small parts damaging the internals. Just hold the front end of Spyra One into any clean water source – a lake, a bucket, or your swimming pool – and push the button to let Spyra One refill the tank.  
Full control down to the last water bullet. Stop guessing how much water you have left to launch that final attack. With Spyra One's digital display, you just know – down to the exact number of water bullets left in your tank. When you shoot, it counts down, and when you refill, it counts up again. This way, you never risk running dry in the worst moment.
Always know Spyra One's battery status. Spyra One's digital display also tells you when it's time to take a break from water fighting and recharge its integrated batteries. Don't worry: You will probably tire from water battles earlier than Spyra One does. The battery easily lasts for a full day of water fights with at least 45 refill cycles and 1125 shots.  
Full pressure whenever you need it. Spyra One's integrated pump repressurizes the water automatically during refilling. The tank system then holds the pressure constant from the first to the last shot. Whether you have 25 shots left or just one, you always have full range and precision. All without any extra supplies like CO2 cartridges. And the best thing: There is no need for pumping anymore! 
No more pumping. Ever. Did we mention this already? It's like magic. While your water fight opponents are still busy working out their biceps to build up pressure, you are 100% back in the game whenever you choose to. You can even interrupt the auto-refill process at any time, ward off attackers, and continue refilling.  
PLAY

Hero Pack: Be the water gun revolutionary this world needs. This is your chance: Choose your own Spyra One and make water fights great again! 
Battle Packs: Pick your favorite friend (or opponent) and get the fight on. Prove your bravery in the eye of cold water with a Fighter Pack of Spyra Ones in your team colors!
Escalation Packs: Planning a mutiny at that other department at work or a 'different' surprise for your best friends’ wedding? We can’t think of better use cases for these packs. Gather your two football teams and get ready for total escalation!
Colors and shipping
Colors (red/blue): We send out a survey for the colors after the campaign ends - you can pick any combination of colors you like. Example: For an Epic Battle Pack (8x Spyra One), you can choose 6 red Spyra Ones and 2 blue Spyra Ones in the survey.
Shipping: To find out the shipping cost for your country, choose your reward and select your country. Larger packs are more efficient – so it really pays to find a friend to back Spyra One with you! Through a special service provider deal, we managed to get local rates for both US and central Europe! Yay!
You, the community, already pushed this campaign farther than we ever thought possible. We have asked ourselves: maybe we can do even more together? And yes, we think we can! We asked you what your wished were, and carefully deliberated what is possible.  
With your help, we decided. If we reach those funding levels together, we commit to deliver the following:
POWER SHOT [UNLOCKED!]: The option to release an extra-powerful water bullet after holding down the trigger for a few seconds.
EXCLUSIVE COLOR: Your Spyra One becomes available in Kickstarter Green. Exclusive for backers, and never available again!
LOCKED: Stretch goal reached at: €666,666 (about $775,000)
SHOULDER STRAP: A modified design that allows to attach a shoulder strap for more comfort in extended water fights and transporting Spyra One.
LOCKED: Stretch goal reached at: €888,888 (about $1,025,000)

Whatever happens on the way – we will keep you informed. Building a hardware product is hard and we may face unforeseen events that are going to delay us. As we have done in the past on our Facebook page and our email list, you can count on one thing: we will always keep you updated on our status and potential delays at least one update per month on Kickstarter.  
Sebastian Walter, Founder of Spyra
Having grown up with the 1990s' iconic water guns, Sebastian was shocked to not find any decent models anymore when he was preparing for a rubber boat party in 2015. Disappointed about the state of the industry, he started working on his own vision of a great water gun on nights and weekends.  
When the first prototype was built a few months later, Sebastian decided to put everything on one card. He quit his job as a product designer at a German car manufacturer and set out to build the best water gun in the world. 
In total, it took more than two years and six generations of prototypes to arrive at a pre-series, feature-complete design prototype of Spyra One. The next step is clear: series production of the Spyra One – with your help. 
The modern water gun was invented by NASA engineer Lonnie Johnson in 1990. After two years of developing the Spyra One, we know why: Making water bullets fly through air is, literally, rocket science. Small amounts of accelerated water shot through air are subject to water turbulence and air resistance. The result: spraying.  
To achieve Spyra One's range and precision, it was necessary to optimize the valve-nozzle system for laminar flow. This was Dominik's job: the Air and Space Engineer tested countless nozzle shapes, over and over again, in our own 9-meter-long test channel.
Rocket Scientist Dominik implementing a new test setup
Turning of differently shaped water gun nozzles
Setup of the nozzle at the test channel
Testing a nozzle in Spyra's shooting channel
Measuring range and spread of the water bullet after 8 meters
Building a water gun in 2018, we can make use of electronics that would have cost a fortune back in the 1990s. The possibilities opened up by modern electronics and software engineering enabled us to implement central features like the integrated pump, the digital display counting your water bullets and a highly efficient electronic trigger-valve system. All of those drastically improve performance and take up less space than their mechanical equivalents. 
Arduino-controlled first garage-built prototype
Soldering the circuit board for a 2018 prototype
To maximize the fun you can have with a water fight, range was important but not by far our only focus. We asked around and found that the biggest pain points in previous water guns were #1, cumbersome screwing and refilling and #2, endless, biceps-wracking pumping to build up pressure.
An integrated, electronic pump that auto-refills and auto-pressurizes was therefore a must-have for the Spyra One. We tested for pumping speed, sound emissions, and battery efficiency, and ended up with a great pumping system. Watch how Sebastian demonstrates the convenience achieved by Spyra One's pump-tank system in our final prototype: Auto-refill and constant pressure, with no pumping at all. 
PLAY

Since Spyra One is electronically controlled anyways, it was only logical to use that to your advantage with a status display. Now your water gun always tells you exactly how many shots are left in the tank. It's great for strategic gameplay – and honestly, it's just pretty cool.
An early prototype of the digital display
Testing the display in the final prototype during refill
We did not test in the lab alone. You – the community – were with us from the start: as roommates who indulged our endless messing with water in the apartment ...
PLAY

 ... Or as testers who subjected the prototypes of our patent-pending technology during trial water fights in our own arena. Watch this fun video we shot for our social media channels where Spyra One competes against two regular water guns in the test arena outside our headquarters:
PLAY

10 people for building a water gun? When we started building the Spyra One in 2015, we would have never guessed that three years later, the project would evolve into a company that would occupy 10 team members in engineering, marketing and business.  
We are here for you! Reach out to us here on Kickstarter, our Facebook page or our YouTube channel. Because shooting us a message is still as easy as hitting our friends with a Spyra One. You have a question? Send it to us: hello@spyraone.com.
With our funded campaign, we have a lot of work to do and that means:
Engineering, production, marketing or sales: we are looking for talented and skilled people. Just shoot us an email at jobs@spyraone.com and tell us:
Why you are excited about the Spyra One
What topic or field you are interested in
Why you would be the perfect fit for our company
For students: From when until when you would like to do your thesis/internship project.
Since June 2018, we are ready to start the water gun revolution! We have fully functional prototypes that we have shown you here on Kickstarter. We have discussed and confirmed the remaining development steps until series production with our suppliers and partners. If all goes as planned, we will be able to complete production in schedule and ship Spyra One to you next summer. 
We have done our part – now we need you! Kicking off a big production entails high set-up costs. As an independent startup company, we can only get it done with your help. That is why you are so important to us: Only if enough supporters back our project by pre-ordering a Spyra One, we will have enough funding to produce, assemble and ship the Spyra One. So – are you in? 
Share Spyra One on Facebook!
              Share Spyra One on Twitter!
  Share Spyra One on LinkedIn!
  Share Spyra One on Reddit!
Email a friend about Spyra One!
         This project is promoted by Green Inbox Partner Program which includes risk free Facebook ads
               Please find our press and media kit here!

updates.update_content:
Hi water fighters 💦🔫
You have all been incredibly patient during the last couple of weeks and we are very grateful for that. But we feel like you all deserve some closure as to what has been going on and why shipping has been delayed for almost three weeks 👇
The first US batch arrived as planned at our US hub on the 14th of July and we were confident that shipping will go as smooth as can be. campaign.story:
Every bridge player wants to share the game they love with the people they love!
My goal is to raise the funds to make available for sale 250 Bridge in a Box games for the Summer North American Bridge Championship in Atlanta, Georgia July 25 thru August 5th. At the present time there is no physical product (other than books or cd's) in a store that a consumer can purchase to learn bridge; no product that a bridge player can buy to gift to a friend whom they want to try bridge.Bridge in A Box provides new players an organized way to learn the game of bridge via a Video tutorial with a workbook or via an App created by Great Game Products -one of the premier Bridge App providers.
This game is designed for people who know nothing about bridge, but can also be useful for those who played many years ago and need a refresher to feel comfortable coming back to bridge. They can choose to learn at the table with their friends and family or by themselves via the app.They can learn by using their phone, tablet or computer.Best of all they can learn to play in their own home and at their convenience.
The game includes a Quick Start option if someone wants an simple introduction to bridge; no bidding, just card play and some of the strategy. Or, for those who want to learn the full game of bridge, the video tutorial and App teach bidding, scoring, play and strategy. Bonus tutorials are included to show the basics of play of the hand.
Bridge in a Box is an alternative option for people who are not ready to spend hundreds of dollars to attend class or not willing to search the Internet looking for videos trying to piece together the information they need.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The two biggest hurdles we face in launching this project are first, consumers have busy schedules and ever-increasing demands placed on their time. Also, time (not money) is a highly valued commodity—whether people are still working or retired. And second, we need to change the perception that bridge is an old, slow game. 

According to Facebook, 41,000,000 people are interested in the card-game, bridge. Unfortunately there are few Millennials and Generation Z new players learning to play. 

Marketing to Millennials and Generation Zs requires creating methods to learn that are compatible with their lifestyles. Once Bridge in A Box is available in one box we should be able to reach them. They can learn by alone or with friends, online and at their own pace on their via an iPad, tablet or phone. 

Time issues are solved for those people whose lives are too busy to block out 8-to-10 weeks to attend classes. With Bridge in a Box, people can learn at their own convenience. 

The second hurdle, the perception of bridge as an old, slow game… an ‘old folks game’ will be solved by virtue of the boxed game itself. Once bridge is learned and played, new players will recommend the game to their friends and get them interested in playing.

Bridge is a game of mathematics, logic, strategy, skill and intuition. It is elegant, interesting and FUN. 

Marketing
There are 176,000 ACBL bridge players that we are targeting to sell Bridge in a Box. All bridge players know someone, who might be a good prospect for a bridge player if it were easily available. 

We have designed a ‘friend to friend’ marketing campaign targeting existing bridge enthusiasts who will likely buy the box to give to a friend.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hate getting robbed? Love solving mysteries? Installing a security camera might seem like an obvious answer for surveillance, but it may surprise you that only 3 out of 10 homes have any sort of security device set up. And, as basic as a security camera system might seem, you’ll be surprised to know that other cameras on the market actually present more problems than solutions.
 eufyCam is designed from the ground up to offer wireless freedom. We eliminated power cables, wall outlets, and the need to drill holes, giving you freedom to install eufyCam practically anywhere. Stick the mount onto any flat surface and eufyCam’s ready to go—in less than a second; or just stick it directly onto most metallic surfaces.
Place eufyCam anywhere you want surveillance.
 In developing eufyCam, we made it our priority to offer the longest battery life in the industry to ensure a convenient and top-notch wire-free experience. So it only made sense that we partnered up with Anker—the leader in charging technology—to maximize the efficiency and charging speed of the battery.
This collaboration resulted in eufyCam having the power to run for 365 days (or 3 years in Standby Mode) per charge when actively monitoring areas such as your front door or driveway, not idling by in your attic.
Birds, dogs, and falling leaves can trigger other security cameras into sending you false alarms. We understand that a security camera that sends you excessive false alarms will just be ignored, or even worse, unplugged.
eufyCam reduces false alarms by up to 95% by applying a 3-step scanning and filtering process. First, register your friends and family as trusted faces, then, once someone approaches the vicinity of your house, eufyCam can determine if that person is someone you trust to further reduce the alerts you get.
After this triple-filtering process, eufyCam will send you a notification according to your security level preference, whether it’s alerting you of all movements detected or only when a stranger’s face shows up.
All this data processing happens in a flash, so you will be notified in seconds when a stranger is at your door.
 The 140° wide-angle lens provides a panoramic view, spanning from your driveway to the front door—with no spots missed—making it ideal for catching people walking past or towards your home.
Top-of-the-line Sony Exmor sensor combine with large f2.2 aperture to offer around-the-clock Full HD surveillance, recording sharp and bright video during the day, plus crisp and clear Night Vision footage in the evening.
Based on 2-camera set and 30 days history review package for a year.
Designed to protect your home as well as your wallet, eufyCam is a one-time purchase that combines security with convenience. Paying for cloud storage should be an option, not a voluntary-but-mandatory cost to claim your security footage.
Because eufyCam records video to local storage, you’ll have easy access to your footage from your smartphone. For Free. Just insert the included microSD card* and you’re all set. Alternatively, by subscribing to our cloud storage plan, you can expand your security options to include simultaneous recording to the cloud.
*Included 16GB microSD card, which you can expand anytime you want, records approximately 1 year of video on one camera, with 10 videos per day, 30 seconds each. 
*Cloud Storage optional for $2.99/month per camera.
Your data is for your eyes only. That's why it's secured with AES 128-bit encryption. Access to your footage requires the microSD card to be inserted into the Base Station it’s registered to, and you are logged on to the account tied to the Base Station. So that means you and only you can access the data. Not a thief, not your neighbor, nor anyone from the eufy Security team.  
Constructed from cutting-edge ASA composite material, which offers unrivaled strength and protection against the elements, eufyCam works perfectly indoors and outdoors. Whether it’s raining, a freezing -4°F (-20°C) winter or scorching 122°F (50°C) summer, eufyCam will keep watch over your home. 
The built-in microphone and speaker provides you with direct communication—via your smartphone—to the door. Whether you’re at home or out, speak directly to whoever walks up to your home.
Open the eufy Security app and your smartphone becomes a window for high-resolution streaming of what eufyCam sees in real-time.
More Capacity - by packing in more battery capacity into the camera 
Better Power Management - by using advanced battery technology from Anker 
Less Consumption - by utilizing HybridWave technology for 70% less energy consumption  
The DNN (deep neural network) algorithms that eufyCam uses are inspired by the human brain, which are designed to see patterns. By recognizing patterns, the DNN algorithms categorize the sensory data eufyCam receives to filter out irrelevant patterns, so only pertinent information is analyzed. 
Once the patterns are analyzed and determined to be human, the facial-recognition engine kicks in to scan the faces to compare to the database to determine if you need to be alerted or not.    
The eufyCam will ship to backers in the U.S., Canada, and 28 European Union countries including the U.K. We will continue to review shipping options for our other backers and keep you posted of any updates. 
eufyCam is built with the future in mind, and that’s why we’ll continually develop peripheral products to work with the eufyCam system, starting first with our entry sensor. The eufy Entry Sensor can help prevent break-ins by sounding an alarm and sending you alerts when a door or window is ajar while you’re sleeping, or out and about. Easily installed and monitored with the eufy Security app, the sensor can operate for 2 years with the included CR123 battery.
 To find out how to order add-ons, please read the April 19th entry on the Updates page.
*Only reward backers can order add-ons. Add-on cameras and sensors can't work independently, need to work with eufyCam HomeBase. 
*One eufy Security HomeBase can support up to 16 eufyCams and up to 34 sensors. Every eufyCam add-on package comes with one magnetic mount and one screw mount.
We’re planning to add support for Alexa, Google Assistant, and IFTTT in the near future, via software updates. We’re making eufyCam fully Alexa-enabled, so you can control it with your voice. By just saying “Alexa, show me the front door.”, Amazon’s Echo Show, Echo Spot and Fire TV will instantly stream footage for you to see—all hands-free.
Support for Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, and IFTTT. 
Support for geofencing. 
Extending the maximum recording time from 120 seconds to 300 seconds.
Support for RTSP streaming, so users can save footage to NAS. 
Support for offline access on the mobile app so users can livestream from cameras and access/download past recordings from local storage when the system is offline. 
Support for offline access on desktop computers (Windows and MacOS) so users can access/download past recordings even when they lose Internet access or our server goes under.
Power adapter will be offered in 3 configurations according to your postal address: U.S./Canada plug, U.K. plug and E.U. standard plug.
We are a team of engineers and designers motivated by making life more convenient. We believe that hassle-free, effective monitoring of your home shouldn’t be a luxury and, more importantly, should be a service you trust. That’s why eufyCam was incubated with Anker Innovations to offer unrivaled battery life, topped with other key features from existing security cameras and cutting-edge functions that enhance the usage experience. We’ve lined up the best suppliers and manufactures we could find, and are ready to introduce eufyCam!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
An on-time delivery date for eufyCam is anticipated. We’re wrapping up the product development phase for the main features, but we’d still like to hear great ideas to implement from you, our backers, about features we can include (as long as it doesn’t impact the delivery date). We’ve found reliable manufacturing partners, but even with the best manufacturing processes setup, unexpected hiccups can happen. Logistics issues are also being solved to ensure smooth delivery for when we’ve exceeded our goal.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
PLAY

Le projet le plus ambitieux jamais réalisé par les auteurs des Machines de l’île et La compagnie La Machine. C'est une sculpture monumentale en acier de plus de 50m de diamètre et de 35m de haut !
Nous savons que vous êtes nombreux à observer nos univers. Les visiteurs des Machines de l’île viennent du monde entier à Nantes découvrir nos créations…Les 4 années de construction de l’Arbre aux Hérons sont un défi pour nous. Nous avons besoin de partager cette incroyable aventure artistique et ce challenge technique et industriel. Le tiers des 35 millions d'euros nécessaires à la construction de l’Arbre sera financé par des entreprises privées et des particuliers. Le Fonds de Dotation Arbre aux Hérons a été spécialement créé pour cette collecte. Nous souhaitons que ce projet soit ouvert à tous. Pour cela Kickstarter est un formidable outil de partage à Nantes et dans le monde.
Plus ce projet sera partagé, plus il sera puissant et remarquable. Nous avons besoin de votre aide pour que ce monde imaginaire prenne vie. Dans un siècle, l'Arbre aux Hérons accueillera vos petits-enfants !
PLAY

This is the most ambitious project to be undertaken by the authors of Les Machines de l’île and La Machine company. A monumental steel sculpture more than 50m (165 ft.) in diameter and 35m (114 ft.) high!
We know many people follow our creative universe. The visitors of Les Machines de l’île come to Nantes from all over the globe to discover our creations. The four years required to build the Herons' Tree will be a challenge for us. We need to share this incredible artistic adventure and this technical and industrial challenge. A third of the 35 million euros necessary to build the Tree will be funded by private companies and individuals. A monetary fund for the Herons’ Tree was created especially for this fundraiser. We want this funding to be available for all and for that Kikstarter is an amazing tool, in Nantes and worldwide.
The more we share this project, the more powerful and remarkable it will be. In a century, the Herons' Tree will welcome your grandchildren !
Depuis 2007, plus de 5 millions de visiteurs ont découvert l’univers particulier des Machines de l’île de Nantes. Inspiré par les mondes de Jules Verne et de Léonard de Vinci, c’est un projet artistique totalement inédit. Après le Grand Éléphant et la Galerie des Machines en 2007, le Carrousel des Mondes Marins en 2012, l’Arbre aux Hérons est la troisième phase des Machines de l'île. Issu de l’imaginaire de François Delaroziere et Pierre Orefice, il prendra place en bord de Loire, à quelques mètres de la maison où Jules Verne a passé son adolescence et où Jean-Jacques Audubon a grandi et dessiné ses premiers hérons.
Since 2007, more than 5 million visitors have discovered the unique world of Les Machines de l'île of Nantes. Inspired by the worlds of Jules Verne and Leonardo Da Vinci, it is an unprecedented artistic project. After the Grand Éléphant and the Galerie des Machines in 2007, the Carrousel des Mondes Marins in 2012, the Herons' Tree is the third phase of Les Machines de l'île. Coming out of the minds of François Delaroziere and Pierre Orefice, it will be located along the banks of the Loire river, a few meters away from the house Jules Verne spent his teenage years in and where Jean-Jacques Audubon grew up and drew his first herons.
                                                  https://www.lesmachines-nantes.fr/  
C’est dans l'atelier de la compagnie La Machine que l'Arbre aux Hérons est conçu et construit par une équipe d'inventeurs d'exception. Toutes les maquettes et prototypes actuellement dans la phase d’étude et de calcul sont présentés au public dans la Galerie des Machines.
Plus de 40 métiers se croisent dans ce lieu de création : des ingénieurs du bureau d’étude aux peintres, des chaudronniers-soudeurs aux ébénistes, sculpteurs, menuisiers. Tous mettent en commun leur savoir-faire et leur sensibilité pour créer des machines incroyables, véritables architectures en mouvement.
The Herons' Tree is designed and built in the Workshop of La Machine company by a team of exceptional inventors. All the models and prototypes built during the design and engineering phase are showcased to the public in the Galerie des Machines.
More than 40 skilled trades can be seen in this creation space: from engineers to painters, from boilermakers and welders to wood workers, sculptors and carpenters. Together, their vision and skills help create these incredible machines-true architectures in movement.
PLAY

La compagnie La Machine c'est aussi des spectacles hors norme à travers le monde : Les Araignées Géantes à Liverpool, Reims, Calais, Nantes et Yokohama, Long Ma-le Cheval Dragon à Pékin et Ottawa devant plus d'un million de spectateurs.
La Machine company  also create larger than life shows around the world that delight millions of spectators: The giant Spiders in the cities of Liverpool, Reims, Calais, Nantes and Yokohama: or Long Ma - The Horse-Dragon in Beijing and Ottawa.
                                                           http://www.lamachine.fr/
L’Arbre est en acier, mesure 50m de diamètre et culmine à 35m. Il est surmonté de 2 Hérons géants qui embarquent à tour de rôle une vingtaine de passagers pour un vol circulaire.
Les 22 branches de l’Arbre ont une longueur développée de plus d’un kilomètre, dont 500 mètres sont accessibles au public. Le végétal s’enracine dans l’acier et le public a accès à d’incroyables jardins qu’il découvre de branche en branche comme dans une succession de terrasses suspendues reliées entre elles.
Cette Cité dans le ciel abrite également tout un bestiaire d’animaux...
The Tree is made of steel, and measures 50m (165 ft.) in diameter and 35m (114 ft.) high. It is topped by two giant Herons that can, in turn, carry twenty passengers on a circular flight.
The 22 branches of the Tree are more than a kilometer (0.6 miles) long, half of which is accessible by foot. The vegetation takes root in the steel and the public has access to incredible gardens which they can discover branch by branch, like a succession of hanging terraces connected to each other.
This City in the Sky harbors a bestiary of mechanical animals.
L’Arbre sera implanté dans une carrière, un écrin de granit face à la Loire. Son orientation plein sud lui confére un véritable microclimat. Que vous arriviez à pied, en navette par le fleuve ou par le haut de la carrière, l’image de l’Arbre s’impose, unie avec les falaises du sillon de Bretagne dont la végétalisation naturelle magnifiera les jardins suspendus.
L’Arbre aux Hérons fera de cette carrière un des plus beaux « jardins urbains du monde ».
Bien sûr il y aura des interactions entre l’Arbre, les falaises et le jardin. Le projet continue d’évoluer !
The Tree will be planted in a quarry, a garden sheltered by granite cliffs, along the banks of the river Loire, where its south-facing orientation will give it a true microclimate. Whether you arrive on foot, by boat or from the top of the quarry, the Tree’s image will impose itself, and the cliffs and their vegetation will magnify the Tree’s hanging gardens.
The Herons' Tree will turn the Chantenay quarry into one of the most beautiful “urban gardens” in the world.
Of course there will be interactions between the Tree, the cliffs and the garden. The project continues to evolve !
Imaginez un enfant de 9 ans installé sur le dos du Héron. Devant lui, la tête du Héron se découpe dans le ciel, ses yeux bougent, le bec et le cou sont mobiles. À droite et à gauche, il peut voir les 2 grandes ailes de l’oiseau battre lentement pour contrôler son vol. L’enfant vole, il sent dans la machine chaque battement d’ailes et fait partie de l’animal...
Les visiteurs de la Cité dans le ciel assistent à toutes les phases du vol qui magnifient l’animal et la machine. Ce voyage est encore plus fou que l’embarquement dans le Grand Éléphant !  
Picture a nine years old child on the back of the Heron. The Heron’s head stands out against the sky in front of him, its eyes move, its beak opens, and its neck moves. On each side he can see the bird’s two great wings gently flapping in the air to control its flight. The child flies : he feels each wing beat; he is one with the bird.
The visitors of the City in the Sky witness every phase of the flight which glorifies both the animal and the machine. This trip is even wilder than riding aboard the Grand Éléphant !
Depuis l’ouverture des Machines de l’île en 2007, nous étudions un écosystème propre à l'Arbre par le biais de la branche prototype, déjà foulée par plus de 4 millions de visiteurs. Cette branche préfigure l'une des 22 branches qui constitueront l'Arbre aux Hérons. Cela nous a notamment permis de tester la solidité, la sécurité et la végétalisation de ces jardins suspendus. Les contenants qui accueillent les plantes permettent de planter des arbres au sein même de l’Arbre. Actuellement, nous expérimentons l’implantation de micros paysages dans les fourches des branches.
Since the opening of Les Machines de l’île in 2007, we have been developing an ecosystem unique to the Tree using the prototype branch, which has been walked on by more than 4 million visitors so far. This branch prefigures one of the 22 branches of the future Herons' Tree. This has enabled us to test its solidity, the safety of its access, and the growth process for the hanging gardens. The planters we installed enable us to grow actual trees in the Tree. At the moment, we are working towards the creation of micro-landscapes amidst the forks of branches.
Dans l'Arbre aux Hérons, l’accès aux jardins suspendus se fait grâce à un escalier à double révolution situé à l’intérieur du tronc : l’un sert à la montée, l’autre à la descente. Le public emprunte les branches végétalisées et les passerelles pour passer d’une branche à l’autre et parvenir au sommet de l’Arbre. Depuis les belvédères, à 30 m du sol, il découvre alors les Hérons, la Loire et Nantes. Le parcours dans les jardins suspendus se termine sur un bar-terrasse implanté sur une branche basse. La capacité des jardins est de 300 personnes.
L’Arbre aux Hérons est une machine de ville accessible à tous. Comme pour le Grand Éléphant sur sa piste, le public viendra librement le découvrir et observer cette Cité dans le ciel !
In the Herons' Tree, the hanging gardens are accessible via a double helix staircase located inside the trunk : one to go up, the other to go down. The visitors walk along lush branches and footbridges to go from branch to branch before reaching the top of the Tree. From the different galleries 30m (100ft) above the ground, they will discover the Herons, the river Loire, and Nantes. The walking circuit through the hanging gardens ends at a patio bar built into a lower branch. The hanging gardens can accommodate 300 visitors.
The Herons' Tree is an urban machine, accessible to everyone. Just like the Grand Éléphant, visitors will be free to discover and observe this City in the sky !
Tous les animaux qui peupleront l’Arbre aux Hérons sont construits dans l’Atelier de la compagnie La Machine. Ils seront à tour de rôle en expérimentation dans la Galerie des Machines et testés par le public jusqu’en 2021. Nous continuons un travail de recherche et de construction pour enrichir ce bestiaire mécanique.
Depuis le 10 février de cette année, une grande maquette au 1/5e de l’assemblage tronc, branches, étais et racines est présente dans la Galerie et les premiers éléments de la volière mécanique sont à découvrir : un colibri géant butinant une fleur ainsi qu’un vol d’oies sauvages.
En 2022, les visiteurs découvriront tout au long de leur balade dans les jardins suspendus, d'étranges animaux mécaniques qui vivent et s'animent dans l'Arbre : fourmis et araignée géantes, chenilles arpenteuses, insectes, mammifères ou encore rongeurs et bien sûr des oiseaux mécaniques. Pendant ces 4 années de la construction de l'Arbre, nous vous ferons découvrir la trentaine d'animaux qui peupleront la Cité dans le ciel !
All the animals which will inhabit the Herons' Tree are built in the workshop of La Machine company. One after the other and until 2021, they will be showcased in the Galerie des Machines and tested by the visitors. We are moving forward with our studies and constructions to enrich this mechanical bestiary.
Since February 10th of this year, a big 1/5 scale model of the assembly of the trunk, branches, support beams and roots is being showcased in the Galerie des Machines, as well as the first elements of the mechanical aviary: giant hummingbird harvesting a flower, and a flight of wild geese.
In 2022, visitors will discover, as they walk in the Hanging Gardens, strange mechanical animal living in the Tree : ants, a giant spider, inchworms, insects, mammals, rodents and mechanical birds. During the 4 years of construction of the Tree, we will show you the 30 animals which will inhabit the City in the sky ! 
                                    L'araignée dans la Galerie des Machines ( par Morvan Frangeul)                                                      Spider in the Galerie des Machines ( by Morvan Frangeul)
PLAY

A partir de 10€, vous recevrez le titre de copartage numérique de l’Arbre aux Hérons en HD. Il sera nominatif, signé par les auteurs et vérifiable à tout moment sur le site des Machines de l'île.
A partir de 50€, vous le recevrez par voie postale (sous tube en carton) en impression luxueuse : papier spécial, dorures, marquages en relief. Dimensions: 32X53.53cm.
From 10€, you will receive an HD digital co-sharing title deed to the Herons' Tree. It will be made out in your name, signed by the authors and authenticable at any time on the website of Les Machines de l'île.
From 50€, you will receive deluxe impression of it by post (in a cardboard tube): on special paper, gold plated, and embossed. Dimensions: 12.5"x20.8"
C’est l’obtention du titre qui ouvre droit au partage de l’histoire de la construction de l’Arbre. Les auteurs vous raconteront cette aventure en 14 chapitres (3 fois par an) . Dessins, croquis, plans de montage, films, photos et récit de la croissance de l’Arbre !
Obtaining the co-sharing title deed opens access to the story of the Tree's construction. The authors will share this adventure with you in 14 chapters (one every three months), including drawings, sketches, blueprints, movies, photos and tales about the growth of the Tree !
Toutes les récompenses envoyées par voie postale seront préparées par un ESAT (Établissement et Service d'Aide par le Travail). All the reward sent by post will be handled by an ESAT (service centre helping disabled people into work). 
Vidéo de présentation du projet: réalisation Dominique Deluze, Xbo films 2018.
Vidéo animation: réalisation MACGUFF .
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Depuis maintenant 10 ans, nous avons réussi à développer des projets urbains via la réhabilitation d'anciennes friches (anciens chantiers navals de Nantes) avec la Galerie des Machines et le Grand Éléphant, aujourd'hui symbole de Nantes. Puis nous avons continué l'urbanisation de l'île de Nantes avec la construction du Carrousel des Mondes Marins en 2012. 

Les 2/3 du financement de l'Arbre aux Hérons sont assurés par des fonds publics : Nantes Métropole, l'État, l'Europe et les autres collectivités locales.

1/3 sera assuré par des entreprises privées, partenaires ou mécènes et des particuliers. Le Fonds de Dotation Arbre aux Hérons a été spécialement crée pour cette collecte. Nous souhaitons que ce projet soit ouvert à tous. Pour cela Kickstarter est un formidable outil de partage à Nantes et dans le monde.

Merci de votre soutien ! Nous avons besoin de vous pour réussir ensemble ce projet.

For 10 years, we have successfully developed urban projects via the rehabilitation of old wastelands (Nantes' former shipyards), with the Machines Gallery and the Great Elephant now the emblem of Nantes. We have continued the urbanization of the island of Nantes in 2012 with the construction of the Marin Worlds Carousel. 

2/3 of the Herons' Tree will be subsidized by public funding : Nantes, the State, Europe and the other local authorities.

1/3 will be financed by private companies, partners or patrons but we want it to be available for all, and for that Kikstarter is an amazing tool, in Nantes and worldwide.

Thank you for your support ! We need you to succeed together in this project.

campaign.story:
Hey!
After 2 Kickstarters and over 100,000 wallets sold, we’re back to spread our love of Tyvek® and Art. Showcasing 7 brand new designs by cutting edge artists worldwide, the Micro Wallet is our slimmest, strongest design yet. Not only that, a portion of every pledge will go to support the artists collaborating with us. Join us in our mission to put beautiful art in every pocket.
 
Micro Wallet is as small as a card when closed, yet fits up to 8 of them easily. A simple yet intuitive clam-style opening allows you to store and access your cards on-the-go with a flick of the wrist.
We know you carry around some bills as well, so we designed an all-new cash compartment. And yes, it fits all kinds of bills.
Micro Wallet starts out at just 0.3mm thicker than a standard credit card. We challenge you to find a slimmer wallet.
Micro wallet is made from one continuous piece of Tyvek® smart material with RFID seamlessly integrated into the fold which makes it virtually unrippable and highly resistant to wear & tear all while keeping your private electronic information safe from theft. Apart from being super-durable, the Tyvek® we use for Micro-Wallet is also water-resistant, so rain or shine, you know you’re protected
Don’t worry about loading up your Micro Wallet with cash, cards, receipts, notes, or whatever else you fancy. It’s paper thin, but still expands over time while remaining beautiful and never compromising durability.
