campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
-- Technology --
For a product like Arsenal, which introduces a new set of capabilities to the market, the immediate questions are, “Is this technically possible, and can this team do it?” 

We decided that the best way to address this risk—both for potential supporters, and for ourselves—was to built it first, then ask for support. Over the last 18 months, we overcame all the major technological hurdles on our roadmap. While there is still plenty of work to be done (see roadmap section), it’s the kind of work many others have done before.

-- Software Development --
When we started writing the code to power Arsenal, we didn’t know how long it would take. Now that the software is functionally complete, we’ve mitigated the timeline risk that net-new software development can entail. The remaining aspects are far more quantifiable in scope and timeline.

Another challenge we wanted to overcome was camera compatibility. We wanted to support dozens of popular camera models and give backers a clear answer on whether their camera would be supported at launch. At the same time, it was important to keep development and QA testing manageable. To accomplish this, we leveraged an open-source camera API to communicate with cameras. In addition to significantly decreasing the cost of supporting each camera model, it allowed us to identify in advance which cameras would support which functions. 

-- Manufacturing & Production --
A challenge specific to hardware projects is finding a way to physically manufacture their product at scale. To mitigate this risk, we decided to design for commercial-scale production from day one.

We’ve already begun lining up supply chain partners, and we’re working with a firm here in the States to help manage the production. The supply chains break down into a few areas. 1) the PCB, 2) usb cables, 3) the case. We're working with a company here in the States to do PCB fabrication. We've found a few suppliers in China for our cables. The case will be injection molded here in United States, and assembly will happen here as well. We also have quotes from a few companies for custom packaging.

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone, Ryan here. I wanted to give a short update on Arsenal. I have a longer update planned that’s coming, but before then wanted to update you on a few things.
You may have noticed we’ve released three new builds of Arsenal in the last three weeks. That’s quite a bit more than our normal pace. The builds were primarily driven by Apple’s roll-out of iOS 13.
Whenever there’s a major iOS or Android release we test Arsenal and ensure there’s nothing that impacts how we interface with your phone. At times nothing changes, but iOS 13 was a pretty big release and it changed quite a bit in terms of how we connect to Arsenal. In addition, for a variety of reasons Apple ended up releasing in the last three weeks. Each of these required testing, and some of them did introduce further changes we had to adjust for. That’s largely why we’ve had to do a second and third build in the last three weeks.

Hey everyone, Ryan here. Our last update was posted in January, which is a bit longer than I wanted to go between updates. Rest assured we’ve been focused on some really exciting improvements in the meantime. There’s a fair amount to cover in this update, so let’s jump into it!
Software Update/Next Release
We have a major software/firmware update that’s currently being tested internally. One of our takeaways from launch last year was to do a better job minimizing hiccups when deploying a release. To do that, we needed to expand our testing protocols. We’ve doubled our QA team recently as a result (Welcome, Dalton!), and put in some more processes and technology to help the QA process.

Hey everyone, Ryan here with this month’s update. Lots to update on, so I’m going to jump right in.
Software Update/Next Release
We had another big release come out in mid-December. In case you missed it, you can read the full the release notes here. We’re working on the following features for the next release. In our last update, we mentioned some of these improvements would be included in the next release or two, and we’re pleased they’re good to go for this next release. We don’t have an exact date yet, but we expect the release to be available sometime during the week of January 14.

Hey everyone, Ryan here with another update.  
It’s been about a month since our last update, so this one will be a bit longer. Going forward I intend to continue with these types of updates, talking about new releases, bug fixes, new features, and general company updates. I expect the frequency to be about monthly, perhaps a bit more if needed.  
Eventually we envision app releases will be on a similar monthly schedule. However, in the short-term as we continue to address bugs, add features, and add support for additional cameras, we expect the app releases to be on a more frequent schedule. When updates are available we will post the app release notes in the of our Support pages as well as an announcement and link to them on our Facebook page.

Hey everyone, Ryan here with this week’s update.

Version 0.9.16 includes support for the Fujifilm X-T1*, bug fixes for some Canon models that were unable to save files to the card in handheld mode, improved Sony Wifi handling, and significant stacking improvements. Please take a moment to update the app version on your smartphone as well as allow for enough time to complete the firmware update on the Arsenal unit before heading out to shoot. Mobile app/firmware version 0.9.14 was published in the last week. From what we’ve seen the release seems to be improving things quite a bit, particularly for Android and Sony users. We are seeing a small percentage of users on Android reporting update/connectivity issues and are working to track the last of those down. We’re also aware of some focusing issues; similarly, this appears to be functioning better, but some edge cases still need to be solved, particularly for multi-point and whole scene focus. campaign.story:
Tex—lock is an innovative textile-based lock, composed of high-tech materials, making it secure, flexible and lightweight.
Tex—lock ist ein innovatives, textilbasiertes Fahrradschloss, das durch Hightech-Materialien sicher, flexibel und leicht ist. 
  follow us on facebook, instagram, newsletter, vimeo
      What about its resilience? Tex—lock is a textile-based lock, which is as secure as steel. We developed texlock to protect your beloved bike, accessories, and outdoor equipment against theft.
Wie steht es um die Festigkeit? Tex—lock ist ein textil-basiertes Schloss, mit der gleichen Sicherheit wie Stahl. Wir haben tex—lock entwickelt, um dein geliebtes Fahrrad, Zubehör und Outdoor-Equipment gegen Diebstahl zu schützen.
PLAY


A test using a bolt cutter demonstrates the resilience of the rope. While common steel products give up fast, tex-lock withstands the attack. Even the use of ice-spray doesn’t help the potential thief. The colder it gets, the higher the cutting resistance of the fibers becomes.
Am Beispiel des Bolzenschneiders lässt sich die Hartnäckigkeit des Seils gut zeigen. Während gängige Stahlprodukte schnell brechen, lässt sich das tex—lock nur schwer bezwingen. Auch der Einsatz von Eisspray bringt den Dieb nicht voran. Bei Minusgraden erhöht sich der Widerstand der Fasern noch.
  PLAY

 Tensile Strength Test
  Zugkraft im Test
Modern leisure equipment continues to evolve into lighter and higher quality variations. Necessary anti-theft devices are continually produced with steel. Most bike locks are rigid, cumbersome and heavy.
Modernes Freizeitequipment wird immer leichter und leistungsstärker. Die nötige Diebstahlsicherung dafür besteht nach wie vor aus Stahl. Die meisten Fahrradschlösser sind starr, unhandlich und schwer.
  PLAY

Weight comparison of steel chain / steel cable / tex—lock rope
The rope itself weights no more than 350 g per meter. Plus eyelets and padlock, we are well below 1kg. See the comparison of common materials - steel cable and chain.
Das Seil wiegt weniger als 350 Gramm pro Meter, mit Ösen und Vorhängeschloss sind es weit unter einem Kilo. Seht hier den Vergleich zu gängigen Stahlprodukten wie Kette oder Stahlseil.
    The rope offers a completely new look, touch & feel. It is very comfortable to handle and flexible enough to fit easily into your pocket, bag or cycling jersey.
Das Seil verleiht dem Schloss eine ganz eigene Haptik und Ästhetik - es liegt gut in der Hand. Steck es einfach in deine Jacken-, Hand- oder Trikottasche!
    It prevents scratches and rattling due to its gentle construction.
Durch seinen weichen Aufbau verhindert es jedes Kratzen oder Rasseln.
As an early supporter you have the unique opportunity to help co-create the product. Choose from the different product variants which offer a variety of colors, lengths and eyelet shapes.
Als Unterstützer der ersten Stunde hast du die einmalige Möglichkeit, zwischen verschiedenen Längen, Ösen und Farben zu wählen.
tex—lock S:  
The small complete package. For short trips and transport in pockets or handbags. Delivered with a quality padlock and saddle mount.
Das kleine Komplett-Paket. Für den kurzen Trip und den Transport in der Hosen-, Hand- und Trikottasche. Kommt mit einem hochwertigen Vorhängeschloss und einer Halterung am Rad.
tex—lock M:
The complete package. Offers enough length to secure your bike in most situations. Delivered with a quality U-lock and saddle mount.
Das Komplett-Paket. Garantiert ausreichend Länge, um das Rad an etwas fest zu schließen. Kommt mit einem hochwertigen Mini-Bügelschloss und einer Halterung am Rad.
tex—lock XL:
The XL secures trailers, luggage or multiple bikes. The small eyelet is pulled through the bigger one and secured with a small U-lock.
Mit der XL Variante lassen sich auch der Kinderanhänger, das Tourgepäck oder mehrere Räder mit sichern. Die kleine Öse kann durch die große gezogen werden und mit einem Mini-Bügelschloss verschlossen werden.
At the end of the campaign, you will be able to choose the color and eyelet-combination of your tex—lock via a survey. Check update 3.
Wir werden euch nach Ablauf der Kampagne in einer Umfrage die Farbe und die Ösenkombination eures tex—lock auswählen lassen. Details unter update 3.
The lock is offered in different designs and components, accentuating each biker’s individual style. 
Das Schloss gibt es in verschiedenen Designs und Komponenten, passend zum Style jedes Radfreudes.
The rope colors
grey/black, black/gold, neon salmon, black

You can choose from these colors as soon as the campaign is successfully funded.
Aus diesen Farben kannst du wählen, sobald die Kampagne erfolgreich finanziert wurde.


 The saddle mount
The saddle bracket fits the tex-lock perfectly and secures it firmly to the bike. It snaps easily into place through the magnet and can just as easily be removed again. The adapter fits all standard seat rails.
Die Sattelhalterung ist perfekt geeignet, um dein tex—lock sicher unter dem Sattel zu fixieren. Wie von selbst rastet der Magnet ein und ist mit einem Handgriff wieder zu lösen. Der Adapter lässt sich einfach an alle Standard-Sattelschienen montieren.
The lock

The locks are offered with these high quality & high security locks. For small eyelets, the compact padlock fits very well. For the longer variants and bigger eyelets, the mini U-lock is the right fellow.
Die Schlösser haben eine hohe Qualität und Sicherheit. Für die kleine Variante passt das kompakte Vorhängeschloss perfekt. Für die längeren Varianten ist das kleine Bügelschloss der richtige Begleiter.
Every tex—lock features a water & dirt repellant outer layer that also adds color or patterns. The patented multilayer construction has been developed over the last 2,5 years. Each layer is made of different high-tech fibre material and each material adds its own special property, like resistence to fire, cutting or striking.
Jedes tex—lock hat eine schmutz- & wasserabweisende Deckschicht. Diese trägt auch die Farbe oder Musterung. Darunter befinden sich Lagen aus verschiedenen Materialien. Jeder Layer übernimmt eine Funktion, um verschiedenste Angriffe abzuhalten.
patented multilayer construction / patentierter Mehrlagenaufbau
applications
 We developed tex–lock to protect your beloved bike, accessories and outdoor equipment against theft. How about taking the lock off your bike and bring it with you to secure your water sport or other heavy equipment? We are planning additional variants for outdoor activities, boats and industrial applications with various security levels and locking mechanisms. Tex-lock opens up a multitude of possibilities.
Wie wäre es, das Schloss vom Fahrrad zu lösen und aufs Wasser zu bringen oder an Maschinen? Wir planen weitere Produktvarianten für Outdoor, Boote und Industrie mit verschiedenen Sicherheitsstufen und Verschlüssen. Tex-lock eröffnet unzählige Anwendungsmöglichkeiten.
 smart
In the future, tex-lock will become smart. During the production process we are able to braid conductive fibers into the rope, opening the door to smart functions like alarms or motion sensors.
Im Zuge weiterer Entwicklungen wird das tex—lock intelligent. Im Herstellungprozess können leitende Garne in deas Seil eingeflochten werden. So lassen sich smarte Funktionen integrieren, z.B. ein Sensor, der beim Zerstörungsversuch laut Alarm schlägt oder ein Bewegungssensor.
  Katja Käseberg, Alexandra Baum, Suse Brand
Alexandra Baum, CEO / Founder:  She gave up her car years ago. On her daily bike journeys she came up with this brilliant idea. Her years of experience in product development of functional textiles and expertise in business management led to the creation of tex–lock.
Alexandra Baum, Geschäftsführerin von tex–lock: sie hat ihr Auto schon vor Jahren abgeschafft. Bei den täglichen Wegen mit dem Fahrrad kam ihr die zündende Idee. Ihre langjährige Erfahrung im Bereich Produktentwicklung mit funktionalen Textilien und Kompetenz in der Unternehmensführung haben tex–lock zum Leben erweckt.
Suse Brand, Head of R&D:  A colleague right from the start, she is the expert for ropes and cables. She has excellent contacts with our business partners and suppliers. She is responsible for developing new products and features for tex–lock. Suse is also a keen cyclist – through Leipzig’s surroundings of meadows and lakes.
Suse Brand, Leiterin Produktentwicklung: Als Mitstreiterin der ersten Stunde ist sie die Expertin für das Seil und den Anschluss. Sie verfügt über gute Kontakte zu unseren Partnern und Lieferanten. Unter ihrer Hand entstehen die neuen Produkte und Features für tex–lock. Auch Suse fährt liebend gern mit dem Rad – durch Leipzigs Auen- und Seenland.
Katja Käseberg, Sales Manager:  Always available for our customers, and with a feeling for the market. A qualified economist with a strong affinity for marketing and sales, she completes the team. She’s an active mountain biker, as well as an endurance and racing cyclist, and is really familiar with the scene.
Katja Käseberg, Leiterin Vertrieb: immer ein offenes Ohr für unsere Kunden und ein Gespür für den Markt. Als studierte Betriebswirtschaftlerin mit starker Affinität zum Vertrieb rundet sie das Team ab. Sie ist selbst aktive Mountainbikerin, fährt Enduro und Rennrad und kennt somit die Szene sehr genau.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
_________________________english_______________________________
Tex-lock is a prototype offering mature design and function. The large-scale production presents us as the developer with the challenge of ensuring a smooth and efficient manufacturing process. Our stringent requirements concerning all components guarantees the highest quality. To ensure this, we cooperate with professional and reliable German manufacturers. We purchase our materials from within Europe, which are usually available within a few weeks.
Nevertheless, technical or temporal delays may occur. Due to our competent partners, suppliers and logistics, we are convinced to fulfill the prerequisites to deliver the tex-lock to all our backers on schedule. If temporal delays occur in the course of the production, we will do our best to compensate for these in a timely manner without any loss of quality. As a backer you will be kept informed. We are delighted you decided to support us.
___________________________german______________________________
Das tex—lock ist ein Prototyp, der in Design und Funktion ausgereift ist. Eine Produktion im großen Maßstab stellt uns als Entwicklerinnen vor die Herausforderung, den Produktionsablauf flüssig und effizient zu gestalten. Wir stellen höchste Anforderungen an die Qualität aller Bauteile. Um das zu gewährleisten, arbeiten wir mit professionellen und zuverlässigen Produzenten aus Deutschland zusammen. Die Materialien beziehen wir innerhalb Europas, wodurch diese in der Regel innerhalb weniger Wochen lieferbar sind. 
Trotzdem ist es möglich, dass es an manchen Stellen zu technischen oder zeitlichen Verzögerungen kommt. Dank unserer kompetenten Partner, Lieferanten und Logistikpartner sind wir aber überzeugt, die besten Voraussetzungen mitzubringen, um das tex—lock planmäßig an alle unsere UnterstützerInnen auszuliefern. campaign.story:
Project Finish is a project planner to organize and plan all your ideas in ONE place. It will take you by the hand and guide you step-by-step to generate ideas, sort through them, keep your ideas organized, and then create a detailed game plan to cross the finish line with ease. 
Project Finish makes it easier for you to take your ideas from start to finish.
    Whether your idea is big or small, it needs dedicated planning space in order to flourish. Your current daily planning system is multi-tasking your daily demands with your big picture goals. 
What happens when you multi-task? Things get half-assed and you can’t afford to half-ass your dreams. That’s where Project Finish comes in – dedicated planning space for your dreams and ideas.
Project Finish is undated which allows you to start it at anytime. You can customize it to your needs. You can choose to use it solely for your projects and big picture goals OR use it as your daily planner AND goal planner. The monthly calendar page is designed to give you this flexibility. 
You can view your monthly, weekly and daily tasks & schedule all on your monthly calendar page. 
  12 Undated Monthly Calendars - Monthly, Weekly + Daily Planning in One Spread
               
             You can click here to share and download via Facebook or Twitter.
  If you prefer Instagram or another platform follow the directions below:
Two simple steps to claim your free sample copy:
1) share this Kickstarter on social media with the #projectfinish hashtag (tag @louyella on Instagram) and...
2) send us an email at finishersmovement@gmail.com with a screenshot or link to your social share.
 1) a MONTHLY size 8 X 10 AND
2) a YEARLY size 18 X 24. You can print the yearly tracker at your local office supply store for less than $5 (ask for the engineers print).
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
PRINTER FULFILLMENT: I have been working with a reputable printing and binding company in the USA for 11 months. After a long and thorough search for a printer, I couldn’t be happier with my choice for a printer. I purchased pre-production prototypes of the planner and was thoroughly pleased by the efficiency, attention to detail and speed at which the planners were printed and delivered. There is always some risk involved with manufacturing a physical product. Things may go wrong even with careful planning. I will do everything within my power to get your planners in your hand on time. I also have a great team and vendors helping me to get these planners to you.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: Pre-production prototypes are made to test the functionality of the product. As Product Finish heads to production, there will likely be some minor adjustment to improve the final product. The final product will have gold foil and high-quality ink that were not included in the prototypes. These adjustments and any others will be for the benefit of producing a quality product and we will let you know how and why any adjustments are made.

Flippr is an ironing board for those of us that don't necessarily enjoy spending an hour a week ironing our shirts, or pants.
Ironing sucks, so we're going to make it quicker and less tedious. If we meet our goal in time you can have it in time for Christmas!
We don't believe in wasting time, but that's what we do when we spend an hour a week ironing.
                                  It's simple. Flippr (Patented) has two sides. 
For your shirts, place your shirt on the torso shaped board, iron, flip,  iron.
Sleeves? No problem. The included detail board allows you to iron collars and sleeves.
For your pants, place them on the board, clip down the seam, and iron!
    But wait, there's more!
  The Flippr is so convenient to wheel around so you can practically use it anywhere. The office, out at dinner, even at the park. 
That being said, you should probably keep it in your home. 
 Check out those wheels tho.
No, not really.
Butttt, think of what you can do with all that extra time that you waste ironing?
You can watch an episode of Game of Thrones.
You can make your significant other some lasagna.
You can call your mother and tell her how much ironing sucks and how the ironing board hasn't changed since it was invented in 1892.
Also, we made a cool chart.
  I don't really iron. Would I need a Flippr?
You probably don't iron your stuff because it's tedious and takes a ton of time. Not with the Flippr, we managed to iron shirts in 2 minutes flat!
                                                                    Flippr has been awarded the Global Innovation Award for Excellence in design.                                                                  Why?
Because It's excellent.
Flippr has also been awarded the A'Design Award for design in homeware.                                                                                 Why?                                                                                            You know why.
      Here at Sharkk we're proud to put consumers first and always be on the forefront of new and innovative designs.  
By focusing on the consumer, we make it our mission to maintain the highest standards of a premium-product experience – without the premium price tag.
  Flippr has been an idea we've been dying to bring to mass market since it was first conceived in 2014. 
The product you're seeing in this project is the result of innumerable hours of iterating and reiterating. We're perfectionists, and we wanted to make sure we got this one right.  
Below, you'll see a brief outline of the journey we're on with Flippr, starting from the first discussion about it to when all of you joined the story!  
We are insanely excited to get Flippr into your hands. So you can be sure that we're going to continue to work day and night until the very last Flippr has shipped.
         Why Are we Charging for Shipping?
  Help Out By Sharing Flippr With Your Friends! #flippr                                           Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who who wears wrinkled shirts. 
            Drop us a Line!
Email us at hello@flippr.com with any questions or feedback, we'll do our best to get back to everyone.

campaign.story:
Zubits Magnetic Shoe Closures are a revolution in footwear.  
Imagine slipping into your shoes as if there were no laces at all...
Imagine securing your laces with a simple click... 
Imagine removing your shoes handsfree... 
Imagine all of this and your shoes actually look better. 
Applying magnets to shoes changes everything.  Zubits benefits go way beyond being just another “no-tie” shoelace solution. 
  Follow & Share...
Zubits.com / "like" on Facebook / Subscribe to Newsletter / Twitter
  Zubits are no ordinary magnets. Patent pending strength is built in.
    How can Zubits be easy to step out of, yet stay on when you run?
Consider that even with your regular shoelaces double-knotted, you can still step on your heel and squeeze out of your shoes because this action generates a lot of force. These forces are not present when you run. That’s why your shoes stay on. When you run, the shoelaces are mostly lifting the weight of your shoe. Zubits are engineered to be incredibly strong for their size. Zubits can hold your shoe secure while running and jumping, but they will split open when you step on your heel because the forces are much greater. Zubits will also come in four strengths to match your size and use.
 Zubits Benefits
               See reactions to Zubits from people on the street...
PLAY

        The final design will not have divots on the face as these prototypes do. The Zubits will be entirely smooth and protected from external elements.
    How to Install Zubits...
PLAY

  PLAY

 Zubits Magnets are surprisingly strong. 
PLAY

  These are not exact color representations of the final parts. But these are the colors we want to manufacture.
    Production Timeline
We have a good working and personal relationship with our California based magnetics engineering company who have their own factory in China. They alone can complete all stages of the production. Above is their estimated production timeline. We have already received prototypes from their factory and will finalize all size designs before the campaign ends. Depending on the quantity ordered, we hope to get the product shipped to backers starting a week after we receive them in California.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Since we have already manufactured one size of working prototypes, making the additional sizes shouldn't be too difficult. Our US based magnetics company has their own factory in China, so they can stay on top of manufacturing and can deliver product directly to us.

If we experience delays, we want to communicate openly and honestly about the process.

We don't know how Zubits will work on every shoe out there in the world. Heavy or stiff soled shoes like boots could make Zubits pop open incorrectly. Yet sometimes the construction of the upper of these shoes actually helps the Zubits stay closed. Large individuals who make extreme movements might also have problems. Zubits normally work great for most people, but if you are uncertain, we recommend buying stronger Zubits (the next size up), or simply lacing them looser can always work.

campaign.story:
TRAVELLERS, EVER THOUGHT - "There's got to be a better way to clean clothes when away from home?"
WE DID! So we developed a portable washing machine -- LAUNDREEZ! 
The Pursuit:
First we brainstormed on shapes, designs and concepts for the bag. When a general idea was reached, we looked to a design firm to turn our idea into a workable solution.
Laundreez is a simple concept, incorporating a screw cap into a dry bag. This design means Laundreez can be used for a variety of purposes making it ideal when travelling.
We tooled our own screw cap which gives the Laundreez the ability to use various add-on accessories*.
Laundreez Design with Screw Cap
A Laundreez prototype was produced and drawings prepared for patent applications.
A few modifications were incorporated to our first prototype run of 50 Laundreez. These were tested for well over a year while we waited to learn about the future of the Patent.
In August 2013, a patent was awarded in Great Britain. Additional applications have been made for patents in Europe and the US.
The Result:
Wash a load of clothes in less than 15 minutes, with less than 7 litres of water!
  PLAY

Details of the prototype
Folded for Packing:  15 cm long (6" long), 12 cm wide (4.5" wide), 8 cm deep (3" deep) Unfolded:58 cm tall (23" tall), 19 cm base diameter (7.5" base diameter) Weight:275 grams (10 ounces) 
Laundreez -- Folded for Packing
 Our Market
Great for washing clothes in so many situations.
College Students -- save on trips to the Laundromats
Backpackers -- forego searching for Laundromats.
Campers -- avoid the wait while others use the campsite sink.
Caravanners -- stop the struggle of washing in small sinks.
Sailors -- no need to head for dry land or calm seas.
Skiers -- enjoy fresh thermals each day and save on packing.
Cyclists -- clean away dirt and grime without damaging delicate fabric.
Work-out Enthusiasts -- pack sweaty clothes after a workout and wash in Laundreez ready to use the next day.
Dancers -- wash delicate leotards and tights.
Baby Clothes -- clean baby's clothes separately from others.
The Future
With full funding we look to have Laundreez in production this Autumn.
We will make two slight changes to the bag and proceed with our first order.
We have negotiated a production run of 1,000 units with our manufacturer.  Although the cost per unit is higher with a small first production run, the total outlay will be less.
*We are currently developing accessories and adaptation for the bag, such as Replacement caps which will transform the Laundreez into a trigger spray bottle, a shower or a watering can.
Laundreez is a better alternative than your washing machine when you have a small load since it uses less energy and water, saving money and the environment.
The Laundreez will not only serve its purpose to clean clothes but also many more. It will become a household and outdoor necessity.
Laundreez
Volume/Weight if transporting water: 7.5 liters weighing 7.5 kilograms (8.0 US quarts weighing 16.5 pounds)
One load of clothes uses approximately 7 litres of water for washing and rinsing. Rinse water (usually around 3 litres) can be used to wash a second load. This makes Laundreez eco-friendly. By containing the dirty soapy water (not using a lake or a river to wash clothes) users can safely dispose of the water and detergent.
Why Kickstarter? 
Prove market for Laundreez. 
Obtain feedback from the community. 
Develop interest in Laundreez. 
Extras
Don't forget to like us on Facebook and share our campaign to help fulfill our goal!
Visit our website for more details!  http://www.laundreez.com/
campaign.risks:

The Laundreez prototype has been tested for over a year and is extremely durable. We are making two small modifications to make Laundreez easier to use. 

We are extremely happy with our manufacturer and the cost structure so we do not anticipate production delays. 

We are allowing 3 months for delivery of Laundreez to us and a month for distribution to our Kickstarter supporters.

campaign.story:
Looking for your Coolest? Follow along with all our production news and updates at www.coolest.com/countdown!
A 21st Century Cooler? It's about time!
Regular coolers are boring, break easily and are a hassle to haul around just to carry the ice. The COOLEST cooler is 60 quarts of AWESOME packed with so much fun you'll look for excuses to get outside more often.
Maybe you want to use the built-in ice crushing blender to whip up some margaritas or smoothies on your next boat trip or tailgate?
Maybe you just want to always have music on hand with the waterproof bluetooth speaker or want to recharge your electronics with the built in USB charger?
What else?
REWARDS:
UPDATE:  Color Voting Complete! 
Here are the Final Coolest Color options. When you pledge for a Coolest we'll send you a survey after the campaign to make your color choice.
Scroll on down for more details...                     
      BLENDER
Nothing is more refreshing on a hot day than a cold blended cocktail or smoothie.  The 18 volt ice-crushing beast built into the COOLEST will power through more than 6 gallons of blended goodness on a single charge.
 WATERPROOF WIRELESS SPEAKERS
If life is supposed to be a party, then you better bring the music. You’re gathered around the cooler anyway, but now you can DJ the music right from your phone or Bluetooth-enabled device directly to your COOLEST. Just turn your phone on, match it with the COOLEST speaker, and rock out with your bad self.
                        USB CHARGER
 Since you’ve got that 18 volt battery for the blender, why not get the most out of it? Maybe your camera battery is low or maybe you have an iPhone you just want to use after 3:00 in the afternoon... Re-charge your gear wherever you are with the waterproof USB charger.
                          LED LID LIGHT
The party doesn’t stop just because the sun goes down, and you shouldn’t have to freeze your fingers searching endlessly for your favorite drink.  The COOLEST has unbreakable lights embedded in the lid so you easily find what you’re looking for with the push of a button.
                       GEAR TIE-DOWN
Carrying your gear to and from your destination is a hassle, and your old cooler isn’t doing you any favors.
The COOLEST's locking tie-downs are like having a roof-rack on your cooler so three trips can be done in one. Easily secure your lawn chairs, blankets, towels, toys, fishing tackle, or grill.
                         BEACH TIRES
One of the worst unintended workouts can be had by trying to drag a conventional cooler through a sandy beach.  The COOLEST wheels are twice as wide so they roll easily and don't sink in.
               ESSENTIAL STORAGE
There are certain essentials you need for any outdoor gathering so why not have a built in cubby to store them?  The COOLEST has storage for a half dozen reusable plastic plates, which also double as a cutting board for the ceramic rust-proof pairing knife.  
                SPLIT LID and DIVIDER
The COOLEST has a split lid design so you can get access to ice for the blender without letting too much warm air in.  This also lets you keep your cups in the cup holders so you don't have to put everything on the ground just to grab another cold drink.
The split lid design and removable divider give you some great packing options.  You can keep your cocktail ice separate from your regular ice. Or you could put ice only on one side, pull the drain plug and the other side becomes a totally dry refrigerator, perfect for keeping sandwiches and any other perishable food cool and dry.
                       BOTTLE OPENER
How many hours of your life have been wasted or teeth chipped because someone walked off with the bottle opener.  My grandpa's cooler had a bottle opener and so does the COOLEST.
THE STORY
I’m always looking to maximize my fun when I get together with my family and friends. That’s why I am so passionate about the COOLEST. I invent lots of things, but other than my Jello-shot catapult very few have brought so much fun to my life. ;)
I know firsthand how much fun it is to have a cooler with speakers, and a portable blender for beachside margaritas, because I built myself one of each around ten years ago. Last year I reexamined these well-loved creations and realized just how much room for improvement there was. 
What's next?
I have manufactured and brought other products to market, but for a project of this size and complexity I'll be using a pool of experts in the field to make sure the COOLEST lives up to it’s name.
The professional sourcing company I've partnered with has manufactured other coolers, as well as high tech gear. They have an experienced team in the field to assist with quality control, shipping and and other logistics. 
We want you to have your COOLEST as soon as possible. Here’s our plan to achieve that:
July/August: Make lots of new Kickstarter friends, execute manufacturing agreements/standards
September:Finalize the engineering and prototype iterations and place the tooling orders
October:  Tooling build-out and procurement of raw materials and components
November: Part qualification and pre-production builds, pilot production, quality assurance and product validation
December: Begin manufacturing for the injection molded and blow-molded parts
January/February: Finalize the assembly and shipment process and begin fulfillment
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially one called the COOLEST. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Kickstarter and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what I see as the risks:


MANUFACTURING: Creating the tooling to manufacture a product of this size is expensive and requires expert knowledge to get it right. There is typically a 60 day lead time to create the molds for a product of this size and this is where delays could occur. To minimize that possibility we're working with tooling manufacturers partners with a track record for prompt quality.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: As the COOLEST gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one back-up supplier for each component pre-located and my product commercialization experts will help ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.

We will be working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you, our COOLEST customer.

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make the coolest idea the COOLEST product by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

We raise a red solo cup of blended goodness in your honor, and say THANK YOU for your help!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
WHO LOVES BURGERS?
My husband Greg and I do, but we always found it challenging to easily make both delicious and fresh tasting burgers at home.
When you buy frozen burger patties at the grocery store they are usually freezer burned and almost impossible to pry apart.
Grocery store freezer burned burgers
There are lots of burger presses on the market. But they only make one patty at a time and there is the problem of where to store the patties until you need them.
Single burger presses - not good enough
INSPIRATION STRIKES!
Last year we launched our first product, The Smart Cookie™ (our first Kickstarter campaign), a storage container that shapes, stores and freezes homemade cookie dough.   We started experimenting with different uses for The Smart Cookie™, such as flavoured butters, baby food, ice cream etc.  Then one day we put extra ground beef in The Smart Cookie™ to make sliders for our kids.  After we saw how well it worked, we decided to create a version that would make full sized burger patties. We quickly realized the Burger Master:
1) Makes eight burgers in less time than it takes to make one.
2) Protects the meat from freezer burn.
3) Allows you to keep your hands clean since you never need to touch the meat.
4) Makes it easy to stuff your burgers with your favorites such as  cheeses, salsa or butter before sealing.
5) Is a container that makes it easy to store and transport the burgers to their final destination such as a barbeque, cottage or the freezer. 
6) Doubles a cooler pack when frozen.
7) Is compact and stackable in the freezer.  Dimensions are 10.6" X 10.8" X 1.25".
8) Is easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
9) Allows you to easily remove the meat, even when frozen.
We decided to adjust our original design to be able to cut meat and to make it large enough to hold 8 quarter pound patties (well actually a little bit extra, 4.5 oz to be exact).  And as an added bonus, you never have to touch the raw meat with your hands!
Burger Master superior design
INTRODUCING THE BURGER MASTER
We decided on the name Burger Master because this product makes all other burger presses obsolete.  There is nothing else on the market that will shape multiple burger patties in one easy step, and also allow you to store the patties in a flat, freezer safe container that does not require any additional separation materials such as pieces of waxed paper or flat plastic discs.  The Burger Master is made from a durable food grade thermoplastic elastomer sourced from the United States.  It is BPA and Phthalate Free and remains flexible even when frozen which allows the patties to easily pop out one at a time as needed.
WHAT WILL WE USE THE KICKSTARTER FUNDS FOR?
Since our products are made from high quality materials, and also made in Canada, we really need to order materials and manufacture in high volumes to be able to keep the costs down to provide an affordable product to the end user.  
We already have experience bringing a product to market and are ready to move forward with the Burger Master.  Be the first to own a Burger Master of your very own!

Just to make things clear…
We had a couple Backers make a very good suggestion that we place our table for rewards and postage at the top of the main page, so it is clear to everybody! So here it is:
To avoid confusion, and be sure you get your reward, please be sure you have pledged the correct amount for your reward level and geographic location.
And remember… to select the multi-coloured set option for your rewards, please adjust your pledge up $10 for every multi-coloured set. You can have a combination of solid colour and multi-coloured, but each multi-coloured set is $10 extra. We will be running a survey to our backers, using BackerKit, after the end of the campaign to make sure everybody is getting his or her desired colour choices.
Stretch Goal Released Early!
It looks like we are going to make it to the $30,000 stretch goal! So, we are just going to add the stretch goal now.
The Periodic Table Frame
This frame will be made exactly like the tiles: laser etched acrylic, painted letters and laser cut.
It will require the same amount of material as the tiles, and will be 12 pieces, puzzle fit, include 24 magnets, and ‘snap’ together around your tiles to keep them organized!
The cost will be only $20, including shipping… anywhere!
Because this reward came about because of you guys sending in your suggestions, it wasn’t even on our radar when we started our campaign. We had another stretch goal in mind, but this one was way better! Because of that, we have not finalized the design, or been able to make a prototype to show you. For that reason, if you want a frame, sight unseen, you can certainly adjust your pledge by $20 and we will include it in your reward, or you can wait to see it later, as we will be offering it through BackerKit, after the campaign has ended.
To be very clear: We will be communicating with every single Backer, through BackerKit, at the conclusion of our campaign, to make sure everything runs smoothly and everybody receives their rewards as quickly as possible!
Thank you for your continued support!
New Stretch Goals Added! Check out Update #5 for details.
$25,000 - Multi-Cloured Sets!
***Done! Check Update #17 for details!***
$30,000 - Periodic Element Frame!
This Almost Didn't Happen!
Ever have one of those AH-HA! moments!? See something, get an idea, and then Google it only to find somebody else has already done it? Of course you have!
Ever had an idea, done nothing about it and then found out later somebody had done it after you would have and is now living on a boat in the South Pacific? Yup!
Well, somewhere in the middle of that is where I saw something, and thought "Somebody has done that", and then... I forgot about it!
From the very first time I watched Breaking Bad, I figured somebody had already jumped on this idea... so, I just ignored it! I am a serial inventor, always coming up with crazy ideas, and I used to keep a list of 'stupid ideas' on my iPhone. After Kickstarter, I renamed the file 'Kickstarter Ideas'. Well, I had a look at the list the other day, and what do I see?
                               "periodic tiles/magnets"
When I Googled it, I was shocked! Really? No one has done this?
That's when this process started... I gathered a team!
Research
How are Scrabble Tiles made? Can we make them the same way? Should we make them the same way? Should they be the same size? What kind of wood do they use? Should we even use wood? Do they have to be the same? The questions went on and on... until we finally came up with this...
They HAD to be strong, durable Acrylic!
They HAD to be accurate!
They HAD to have white lettering!
They HAD to use very strong Rare Earth Magnets , and
They HAD to be handmade.... just like Heisenberg's Meth!

The Prototype
Before moving on to the transparent acrylic sheets, we tested our program on a wood sheet.
Then we tweaked the program to make it run faster and then, when we had the program right, we cut the acrylic!
And here they are, 20mm x 20mm (3/4" x 3/4") tiles with 6mm diameter (1/4"), NdFeB, N42 Type, Rare Earth Magnets on the back. I hate it when you can't even hang up a picture on the fridge without it sliding down! That's why the Rare Earth Magnets.... they cost more but they are strong!
Heisenberg Tiles!
The 'Walter Green'
 The 'Opening Credits'!
And for fun...
a Bio Hazard Bag to hold them in!
'The Heisenberg'!
 And for fun...
 a Bio Hazard Bag to hold them in!
 How Strong are these Magnets?
That's the whole set up there... without magnets on them... 118 tiles!
Here are the Colors...
'Walter' Green... Money Baby!
Ginger 'Todd'
Blood Red 'Gus'!
'Saul' Yellow... What else!
'Heisenberg' Blue... that's Meth Blue! 
And Finally...
Forget all that level crap!

You spoke and we listened! At the end of the campaign we will send out a survey and you will pick any damn color you want! Any combination, for any reward! Ummm... except the 'Opening Credits'. Those will have to stay 'Walt' Green only, I'm afraid.

You want 5 'Meth' Blue? You get 5 'Meth' Blue!

You want 1 'Walt' Green and 2 'Meth' Blue? You got it!

You want the 'Pinkman' ? It's all yours!

Any Color!
Any Combination!
Your Choice!
All kidding aside, this isn't just an homage to your favorite TV show of all time, it is a fun and interactive way to learn the Periodic Table of Elements. Keep them on your fridge and spell new words each day. 
Get multiple sets and build compounds or molecules!
***** New Colours Added! *****
As a BIG THANK YOU to our supporters for getting us to our funding goal of $15,000 and, over the top to $20,000! We are adding FOUR colours to choose from!
DEA Blue
Marie Purple
Badger Smoke
and, just for Fun... Neon Green!
A note on the Rewards Levels and Delivery
We have backers all around the globe: Australia, Germany, the UK, Russia, Israel, Singapore, Japan, Sweden, Switzerland… who knew the reach of Breaking Bad and Kickstarter! In an effort to keep costs down for all, we tried to design the rewards with 3 tiers of delivery:
Free delivery within Canada
An additional fee for the United States (which was the “outside Canada” option on Kickstarter, and
A final additional fee for deliveries World Wide.
These suckers are heavy! 118 tiles, with magnets, bag, and envelope is over 250g (half a pound)! That’s a lot of stamps!
Please have a look at the rewards table below, and pledge according to your geographic location.
Thank you again for your continued support, Andrew Barron and the entire ‘Heisenberg Team’!
What Kickstarter is for ...
We believe in a high quality, finished product. We could hammer out about one a week if we had to carve by hand, but we ain't in no RV anymore... we need a lab and a CO2 laser to do it right!
So we need you, to raise enough start-up to afford the use of the Laser Cutter!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have every reason to believe that we will make our target dates for delivery. And why not? It's not rocket science, just Laser time and labor. Once we have funding we will begin production and will start mailing Rewards within 16 weeks or sooner!

There is the very slim chance that a certain corporate giant will take offense to our tongue in cheek offering and call for a halt to our campaign, but we really do not intend any infringement on trademarks or copyrights to the popular TV show, and don't anticipate any hassles. We are just trying to make a fun and tactile way to encourage the use of the tiles to help Chemistry buffs and students learn the periodic table.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We divided into three sections to illustrate our reactions and plannings for the predictable challenges and risks:

Product ─ 
ZENLET production is a concept proposed from the Zen thinking. The greatest challenge to implement this concept in practice is: How do the least amount of component designed to open a slide-opening switch that allows users to easily expand all the cards with one hand? In this section, we spent a lot of time researching, developing and designing, passing through times of proofing, revising and numerous tests. Today, as products showed in films, are indeed fulfilled the expectations.

Manufacturing ─ 
ZENLET parts, separated into ABS / PC, TPU and stainless steel three materials, require three sets of metal molds for mass production. Some parts are particular about exquisite precision. Contrary to the general wallet, the difficulty and cost of making must be much higher, is why we set a higher amount of fund-raising and the need to rely on your support.

Shipping ─ 
We conservatively rather than exaggerated estimate the time needed for the manufacture and packaging, which the purpose is to serve ZENLET to the backers hands in the committal time. In addition, we tend to prioritize sending the areas requiring a longer delivery time, so that all the backers can get them at a similar time. Of course, if all the work completed ahead of schedule and we are very glad to let this thing early realization!

Having said that, knowing that there may be unanticipated challenges along the way, and in the true spirit of crowd funding, we intend to be totally transparent with any hurdles that we encounter and will keep you up to date. At the moment, we think the biggest challenge will be how to make ZENLET spread to the world. campaign.story:
Posture MD - The most comfortable back support in the world
Take a lumbar support, add middle and upper back support. Now, add a unique design that changes posture while adding long term comfort to extended periods of sitting at work or driving. This was the thought process behind the creation of Posture MD.
Fast Results
Spend 30 minutes sitting at your desk or in the car and you will notice the small discomforts of the low back, upper back, shoulders, and neck. Lumbar supports are an incomplete solution. Full back support that fits in almost any chair is the answer.
 Our product offers a long term solution for comfort. You will be able to maintain good posture without effort on your part. The result is being able to sit and work comfortably uninterrupted by discomfort.
 - Restores natural posture to create long term comfort while sitting.
- Lumbar pillows alone, do not address the needs of the rest of the back. 
Unique, Revolutionary Design
Posture MD's revolutionary staged-wedge design keeps the users pelvis back while getting progressively wider where contact with the upper back is made. The patent pending convex-tech full back support allows shoulder blades to wrap around Posture MD. Simply sitting against Posture ME will create better posture .
The sleek design will compliment both modern and vintage chairs
Universal fit for all car and desk chairs
The Origins of Bad Posture
Posture MD's team members work with many clients who spend the majority of their day sitting at work, driving, sitting at home, ect.... 9 out of 10 had a forward head, rounded shoulder, arching back look. The "Hunchback of Notre Dame" appearance.
 Create confident posture habits while you drive
During initial screenings, client history's revealed the vast majority use some type of lumbar support. This made us start looking for a way to make a support that addressed the inadequacies of the ineffective lumbar supports.
  One of our team members was sitting at their desk writing emails and noticed their posture had slowly crept into the very position most of our clients had when standing. 
We went back to the books and using the principle of "muscle memory" began to create a solution for posture that was able to be used in the chairs people already owned (who wants to buy a whole new chair?). 
Our team wanted a solution without the user having to think about it..."focus on work, not your posture" We thought. 
Your Chair: The Culprit 
Standard concave chairs actually promote hunched over posture
  We instructed a participant to consciously fix their posture and the team looked at how the chair lined up with the users body. Two problems arose:
1) When sitting with good posture, the back of the chair had no contact with the users body
2) Unless the user constantly made an effort to maintain my posture, they gradually slouched into poor posture as well. (Good thing they were only doing 30 minutes of emails per day, and not the average 9.3 hours of sitting.) 
 Concave chair causes shoulders to round forward. Chairs with greater than 90 degree back to seat angle: low back rounds, slumped over.
Posture MD: The Solution for Unconfident Posture
Muscle has memory and when subjected to sitting in certain positions or postures for prolonged periods, changes the length of the muscle and alters posture. The body, operating in terms of efficiency, recognizes the body is in certain positions for prolonged periods and keeps the body in that position so no energy is wasted to get into a position.  Sitting against the Posture MD sets you into proper posture with no thought. Good sitting posture directly creates good standing posture. A more confident look leads to a more confident attitude.
12 Months of Development
Our 5 design and function goals
  Original Drafting
Rough Protoyping for field testing
Finalizing our design to every degree. Pouring our first dozen Units for final testing
 With our background in manufacturing, we have done extensive research, planning, and have tested production in temporary molds. With your support, we will be using the Kickstarter funds to make full production injection molds that are capable of making a quality and consistent product. The molds will be CNC’d out of large aluminum blocks and supplemented with coolant line and a premium lubricant to maintain our precise design.  These will all be made in the USA and are expected to ship 10 weeks after we submit the initial PO.
Michael Tunney - Manufacturing Engineer, Brendan Ridings - Corrective Exercise Specialist
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have done extensive business planning, mapping out financials and timelines. As our design and engineering is completed, our production prototype has been tested and approved, and we have selected vendors for tooling, manufacturing, and distribution, we truly believe time is our biggest hurdle.

Design hurdle: leaner users felt pressure on the spine. This resulted in a change in design which took the contact points off the spine all together and placed more emphasis on the muscles next to the spine. An added bonus made the new contact points second as a massaging area on the back muscles.

Design hurdle:
Initial design pushed the users hips too far forward making some users re-adjust their chair to accommodate Posture ME.
We increased the angle from hip contact point and upper back contact point which also made the user sit straighter. 

Design hurdle:
Experimentation of different duerometers of foam to achieve a long term, soft user feel while being able to maintain shape with extended use.
Testing procedure included 1 year of use at a minimum of 8 hours per day, 5 days per week. Our team was able to create to the proper polymer blend that could maintain structural integrity while being comfortable all day.

Similar hurdles arose with our silicone based inserts. The blend created had to be soft enough for comfort but able to maintain shape and integrity with long term use.

Final dimensions are done. Functional prototypes are complete. User ready versions created. Money raised will go directly into manufacturing the costumer ready product. Pending funds being fully raised, production will begin immediately. 
Having backgrounds in manufacturing engineering, we are confident we can achieve our production goals.

EverDock Go: The Only Dock You'll Ever Need for Your Car
Buy the EverDock Go and Dash at fuzdesigns.com
Works With Any Phone in Any Car
At FŪZ Designs, we don't think you should need to replace your old accessories every time you upgrade your phone. This is a nuisance for you and it is environmentally unfriendly. So, we created the EverDock Go and EverDock Dash with compatibility and beauty in mind.
Whether you own an iOS or Android device like the iPhone, Samsung Galaxy series, HTC, Nokia, Blackberry, or any other smartphone, you can rest assured that the EverDock Go will charge your phone in style.
Not only does the EverDock Go work with any phone, but it also fits in just about any car. Utilizing an ingenious locking disc, the EverDock Go mounts and dismounts from your car's cup holder or dash in just seconds.
Apple or Android and Everything Else
Regardless of who makes your device or what cable it uses, the EverDock Go will provide you with years of enjoyment. If you upgrade your phone or even change to a new platform, your EverDock Go will be able to change along with you.
Whether your phone uses a Lightning Cable, 30-pin cable, micro-USB cable, or even has a headphone jack at the bottom to connect to your car, the EverDock Go can accommodate your needs without a problem.
Any Make. Any Model
Cars come in all shapes and sizes. Creating a docking solution that works in any car wasn’t easy.  Over half of the states in the US have outlawed mounting devices to the windshield, so window mounts were eliminated.
So, we decided to focus on the cup holder and the dash. Mounting the EverDock Go inside the cup holder was a challenge we solved by using a small locking disc placed at the bottom of your cup holder. This same mounting solution works great on the dash version.
Using this ingenious mounting method, the EverDock Go and EverDock Dash stay firmly in place in any car yet they are easily removed with just a simple twist. 
***Verify EverDock Dash Fits in Your Vehicle
Due to the differences in slopes of windshields and dash shapes and sizes, we strongly recommend you verify the EverDock Dash fits in your car. Please download the PDF and print it to 100% scale to verify fit in your vehicle. You'll probably want to allow about 1in or 25mm of room at the top so you can dock and un-dock your phone easily.
This is not necessary with the EverDock Go. The EverDock go is about the size of a soda can so it will fit in virtually every cup holder ever made.
Click Here to Download Fit Template for EverDock Dash
Click Here to Download Fit Template for EverDock Dash
PLAY

With or Without a Case
After launching the original EverDock, it became clear that people use a wide variety of cases. We wanted to accommodate those as well. So, the adapter has infinite adjustability on the vertical plane and four adjustments horizontally allowing the EverDock Go to accommodate virtually any case on the market. The EverDock Go will even accommodate cases as thick as the OtterBox Defender Series.


Elegant Design
The world's best products are clean and free from unnecessary parts and ornamentation. Screws and tools are a pain and often get lost.  Utilizing an ingenious adapter and cord management system, the EverDock Go allows you to install or change cables in seconds without the use of any tools or screws.
We researched the current offerings of stands and mounts for the car but were unimpressed with the cheap materials, the cumbersome installation and cords falling to the floor. With the EverDock Go, we insisted on an Aluminum top that exudes the same quality and high end look and feel of your phone and your automobile.
No screws, no parts to lose
Simple Setup
A good accessory is designed to enhance your experience with your device. If setup is cumbersome or difficult, your experience will be diminished. That's why we made the EverDock Go to be completely painless to setup and enjoy. Watch this short video below to see how simple it is to start enjoying your EverDock Go.
PLAY



Effortless Two-Finger Removal
We all have hundreds of things going on at once. Your dock shouldn't require two hands or some sort of finger yoga to remove your phone. You want simple and easy removal of your device no matter what's going on. With the EverDock Go, we call it two-finger removal. Just grab and go.
Even Works With Auxiliary Audio Cables
Several popular phones on the market include stereo line-in or "aux cables" allowing you to listen with headphones or to plug directly into your car stereo. We knew many of you would want to connect to your car stereo this way, so we are including an auxiliary plug allowing you to plug your current aux cable directly into the EverDock Go. Yes, we thought of everything.
"Aux Cable" with Lightning connection for iPhone 5 and 5S
Use Your Standard Apple Lightning and 30-pin cable. Micro-USB Cable Included.
Each EverDock includes a customized micro-USB cable (1m/ 3ft long) designed specifically for your Android and other non-Apple devices. In order to avoid any unnecessary delays, and to ensure compatibility, Apple users can simply use their standard Apple lightning and 30-pin cables(Apple cables are not included).
Tech Specs
Enjoy all the details of the EverDock Go and EverDock Dash. You may need to click on the "Play" button on the image below and you can drag and drop the image that appears so you can view the EverDock Go and EverDock Dash in 3D.

Available in Silver or Black
The EverDock Go is available in Silver or Black creating a dramatic look that will complement your devices and your car.
Buy the EverDock Go at fuzdesigns.com
How the Funds will be Used
The funds raised will go towards tooling, purchasing of raw materials, production, and shipping. We have finalized the design and qualified the manufacturer. We expect tooling to begin in May, production in June, and shipping from the factory in July.

Link to Press Kit

EverDock, Our First Kickstarter Project
When we launched the EverDock on Kickstarter, we were absolutely blown away by the reception we received. We wanted to meet everyone’s expectations and we think we did. In just two months, we shipped over 10,000 units to our backers. To learn more about the EverDock, please visit our EverDock Kickstarter project.
Feel free to look through the comments section here to see what our previous backers thought about the original EverDock and the service they received from the FŪZ Designs team.
About Us
  FŪZ Designs was founded by David Gengler and Cameron Gibbs to create exceptional products for today's electronic devices. Utilizing a rigorous design and development methodology, FŪZ is positioned to create innovative solutions for today's demanding consumers. 
Formerly the Director of Product Development at ZAGG and inventor of the ZAGGmate and over a dozen other audio, keyboard, power, and gaming products, David has several design and utility patents and patents pending. His products have received numerous rave reviews and awards including 4 CES Design and Engineering awards. These products have been featured on CBS, ABC, NBC, Fox, and the Oprah Winfrey Show.
Cameron has more than 11 years of leading business in the consumer electronics industry. As a product and marketing manager, Cameron helped grow Sewell Direct to become one of Utah's fastest growing companies in 2006. As Senior Product Manager at ZAGG, Cameron led the development and delivery of many award-winning products including the company's first wireless speaker and family of power products.
Together, Cameron and David combine design, engineering, and execution talents that make them uniquely qualified to deliver on projects like this.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As former product developers for a publicly traded company, we know what it takes to deliver a great product on time. In addition, we have already delivered on one of the most successful Kickstarter campaigns of 2013, so we know how to navigate Kickstarter's unique challenges.

We have spent months designing, testing, and refining the design. We've already selected the manufacturer and started some basic tooling. The samples you see in the photos and videos work great and look fantastic, so we won't need to waste time tweaking the design. We have also adopted the BYOC (Bring Your Own Cable) approach to this project to avoid any unnecessary delays or compatibility problems associated with sourcing Apple's proprietary cables.

However, every project caries with it certain risks. The most common risks are potential delays in tooling, obtaining raw materials, packaging, and shipping. While we feel like we have reduced these variables as much as possible, they can never be completely eliminated.

We feel our experience and familiarity with our manufacturer and the product development process gives us a unique skill set in handling unexpected problems. Most importantly, we will make sure to give frequent updates about progress so you'll always be informed about the status of the project. We think you'll find our transparency to be a breath of fresh air.

Please don't ask for a tracking number.

Sorry for starting with that. I wanted to start with, Yeah! We are shipping! But then comes the tracking number questions :)

I've spent the last week here at our factory and will be heading home tomorrow. I spent most of today at the factory and walked away very pleased with how things are going. Production should be complete by the end of the week and shipping to you should be complete by the end of next week. Thanks so much for your patience during the past 5 weeks. We really appreciate it and all the support you've given us during this project. The EverDock Go turned out very nice and we are quite confident you're going to love it.
If you have any questions, please email us at support@fuzdesigns.com

We had a couple people in the comments section remind us it's been a few weeks since we posted an update. Sorry for the longer-than-normal delay. Everything is going great, so there is nothing exciting to report, but I thought you'd probably love to know there won't be any further delays. 
The tooling is complete enough to make a test piece and it is exactly what we want. We need a few more days to clean up the mold and add the right texture and then we can finally get everything assembled, boxed, and shipped. Our last estimate of end of October or first week of November is still the plan.

This is the most frustrating Kickstarter update we've had to write. While testing the adapter for the EverDock Go, we found it didn't quite accept as many variations in thicknesses of different cables as we required. As you know, we wanted to accommodate as many thicknesses of cable "tips" as possible because many cars have tips that cannot be changed. EverDock Go includes an adapter with a spongy material that can expand to work with different thicknesses, but the production models weren't as adaptable as we required.
When we realized this a couple weeks ago, we started a quick tooling change. We just needed to remove a little plastic from the adapter. We were hopeful this would be a very quick repair. Unfortunately, it didn't turn out this way. In fact, we were just informed yesterday that the entire tool would need to be discarded and we'd need to remake a new one. Needless to say, we were exceptionally frustrated. This is not the way any of us wanted to start the weekend and it is especially frustrating given that we were right on the edge of a September delivery to begin with.

We hope you're all having a great weekend. We just wanted to let you know all the parts have been ordered for production and we are still on track. We also got our hands on the iPhone 6 and wanted to send some photos. Interestingly enough, the distance between the back of the iPhone 6 Plus is only .01mm different from the 5 and 5s. The 4.7 inch iPhone 6 is only .2mm different. Because of the incredibly small differences in size, we didn't need to make any modifications to the EverDock Go. The same can be said for our original EverDocks.

I have one more day left in my trip and we are just about ready to start mass production. The last detail before mass production can start is to sign off on each and every part of the product. It's always quite fun. You generally do it in triplicate for each part, so it's a little like signing paperwork for a mortgage application. The excitement and anticipation lead to carpel tunnel syndrome by the time you are done. But I made it through without any serious injuries. Take a look at all the parts inside the EverDock Go. I'll bet you didn't know it had that many parts.

I just booked my trip to China for the next couple weeks to make sure the EverDock Go and Dash look perfect and to make sure production goes perfectly as well. I will be sure to send lots of photos and keep you updated on all the final details. It's a long flight but I really enjoy working with our partners there and sharing the process with all of you. 
We hope you got a chance to see our Noke. It's off to a great start thanks to the continued support of many of you. We really appreciate all of you for making this possible and look forward to delivering another awesome product. In case you missed it, you can find it here. www.getnoke.com
